<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id553d7601b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>BYLAWS OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF ORGANIZATION&rsqb;</inline.instr>, ANEW YORK NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION</name></form.name.block>
<form.unit>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>I</designator><name>NAME AND OFFICES</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Name</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The name of this organization shall be <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Office</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> may have its office in a location to be determined by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall maintain an office located at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, New York.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The corporation may have such other offices as may be designated from time to time by <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;names of members&rsqb;/board of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>II</designator><name>PURPOSE</name></name.block></head>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The purpose of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall be to function as a trade association and:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to promote the common business interests of its membership;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to promote public understanding of the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to foster congenial and collegial relationships among those involved in the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to serve as a clearinghouse of information to assist its membership in remaining abreast of new technology in the field of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to provide continuing training and education for those engaged in the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;type of business&rsqb;</inline.instr>; and</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>to establish and enforce uniform standards for those engaged in the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;type of business&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>III</designator><name>MEMBERSHIP</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Eligibility for Membership</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A person who is or have been engaged in the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;type of business&rsqb;</inline.instr> for a minimum of <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years may, upon approval of his or her application, become a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>. A rejected applicant shall not be eligible for membership until the passage of <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr> after the date of any previous application.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Forms for application to become a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall be designed by the Board of Directors or by individuals appointed by the Board to design such forms. Application forms may be amended, from time to time, subject to the approval of the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Forms for application to become a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall be furnished in a timely manner to individuals requesting such forms.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In order to be considered for membership, an applicant must submit at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of letters&rsqb;</inline.instr> letters of recommendation written by present or past members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A nonrefundable application fee of not less than &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of nonrefundable application fee&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall be required of membership applications at the time an application for membership is submitted. The amount of this nonrefundable application fee may be amended from time to time by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>No applicant for membership shall be discriminated against because of race, sex, color, religion, ethnic or cultural background, sexual orientation, or previous membership in a lawful <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>G</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Decisions to approve or to reject membership applications shall be made in a timely manner by individuals appointed by the Board of Directors to make such determinations.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>H</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>All deliberations and determinations made in regard to membership applications shall be confidential and may not be disclosed without written consent of the applicant in question.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Categories of Membership</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>There shall be seven categories of membership in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>: introductory membership, full membership, sustaining membership, organizational membership, honorary membership, life membership, and emeritus membership.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Introductory membership is open to individuals who have not been a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> during the preceding <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> years. An individual may be an introductory member for <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> years after which time that an individual is eligible to become a full member, sustaining member, honorary member, or life member.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The annual fee for individual membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.<inline.instr>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the annual fee for individual membership.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>An introductory member shall have the same rights and privileges as a full member except that <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of reduced rights and privileges&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Full membership is available to all members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The annual fee for individual membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the annual fee for individual membership.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A full member has the right to vote in annual and special meetings and to vote on special questions presented for determination to the full membership of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>. In addition, a full member is eligible for election or appointment to the Board of Directors and to any office or other position in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Sustaining membership is available to all members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The annual fee for sustaining membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the annual fee for sustaining membership.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In addition to the rights and privileges granted full members, <inline.instr>&lsqb;a sustaining member has the following additional rights and privileges: &lsqb;list of additional rights and privileges&rsqb;/the &lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to specify rights and privileges&rsqb;&rsqb; has the power to specify additional rights and privileges for sustaining members&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Organizational membership is available to any organization which qualifies for membership and which is interested in promoting the objectives of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The annual fee for organizational membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.<inline.instr>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the annual fee for individual membership.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The rights and privileges granted organizational members <inline.instr>&lsqb;shall be &lsqb;list of rights and privileges&rsqb;/will be as the &lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to specify rights and privileges&rsqb;&rsqb; specify&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Honorary membership may be conferred by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> on any individual who has distinguished himself or herself by endeavors relevant to the goals and objectives of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>. An honorary member shall be selected by <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of method of nominating and selecting honorary members&rsqb;</inline.instr>. There shall be no annual or other fee for honorary membership. The rights and privileges granted honorary members <inline.instr>&lsqb;shall be &lsqb;list of rights and privileges&rsqb;/will be as the &lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to specify rights and privileges&rsqb;&rsqb; specify&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>G</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Life membership is available to all members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The one-time fee for life membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of life membership fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the fee for life membership.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The rights and privileges granted life members shall be the same as those granted to full members.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>H</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Emeritus membership is available to all individuals who have been a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years and who have either reached the age of <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years old&rsqb;</inline.instr> or experienced an illness or disability that renders them incapable of engaging in full-time work as in the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;type of business&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The annual fee for emeritus membership shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual fee&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to set fee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> has the power to set the fee for life membership.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The rights and privileges granted emeritus members <inline.instr>&lsqb;shall be &lsqb;list of rights and privileges&rsqb;/will be as the &lsqb;board of directors/membership at large/&lsqb;specification of corporate entity empowered to specify rights and privileges&rsqb;&rsqb; specify&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>I</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Categories of membership may be discontinued or new categories of membership may be created by <inline.instr>&lsqb;the Board of Directors/the membership at large&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Default in Payment of Membership Fees</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Any person or organization whose membership fees remain unpaid <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr> after those fees become payable shall cease to be a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and shall have none of the rights and privileges accorded a member, provided that the member in default has been give written notice of the default on at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of occasions&rsqb;</inline.instr> occasions. If default in payment of membership fees is due to illness or disability, the Board of Directors may, in its sole discretion, waive payment of those fees for a period not to exceed <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Termination of Membership</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Membership in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall terminate upon: (i) cancellation of membership by the member himself or herself; (ii) death of the member; (iii) default in the payment of membership fees as provided in Section 3, above, of this Article; or (iv) expulsion of the member by the Board of Directors for a reason other than default in the payment of membership fees.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Board of Directors may, by majority vote, expel a member for good cause which shall include, but not be limited to, ethical or criminal violations or conduct bringing <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> into disrepute.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>No refund of membership fees paid shall be made in the event of the termination of an individual&apos;s membership.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item></form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>IV</designator><name>OFFICERS</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Authorized Officers</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall have the following officers: <inline.instr>&lsqb;titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Terms of Office</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The President and the Vice President shall each serve a <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr>-year term of office, beginning on <inline.instr>&lsqb;begin date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr> and expiring on <inline.instr>&lsqb;end date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Treasurer and the Secretary shall each serve a <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> year term of office, beginning on <inline.instr>&lsqb;begin date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr> and expiring on <inline.instr>&lsqb;end date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Vacancies</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>If the President is unable to complete his or her term for any reason, the Vice President shall serve the remainder of the term as President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>If the incumbent Vice President, Treasurer, or Secretary is unable to complete his or her term for any reason, a replacement shall be appointed by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of entity&rsqb;</inline.instr> to serve the remainder of that term of office.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Term Limits</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A past President may not at the end of his or her term as President again be nominated for or serve as President or Vice President until <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr> has passed.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A Treasurer or Secretary may not be nominated for or serve more than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive terms&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive terms in that office. Time in office as a Treasurer or Secretary pursuant to an appointment to serve a partial term to replace a former incumbent who resigned, was removed, became incapacitated, failed to remain a member in good standing, or died shall not be considered as a term of office unless that appointee served in that office for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>5</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Qualifications for Office</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>To be eligible for nomination and election as President or Vice President, an individual must have been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years and must have served in some other elective or appointive office in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> or one of its state chapters.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>To be eligible for nomination and election as Treasurer, an individual must have been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> years and must have demonstrated experience in financial planning.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>To be eligible for nomination and election as Secretary, an individual must have been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> years.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>6</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Procedures for the Nomination and Election of Officers</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Written suggestions of proposed nominees may be made by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for consideration by a nominating committee appointed by the President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The nominating committee shall submit to the Secretary a slate of eligible nominees for each office for which election must be held in that year. In submitting this slate, the nominating committee shall consider written suggestions of proposed nominees made by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> but need not place any suggested name on the slate of nominees submitted.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Individuals desiring to serve as an officer of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> may, if not approved by the nominating committee, run for office as a &ldquo;write-in&rdquo; candidate by presenting to the Secretary <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled election a petition signed by <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr> members in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Upon receipt of a slate of candidates from the nominating committee and receipt of any petition for &ldquo;write-in&rdquo; candidacy, the Secretary shall verify that each candidate consents to serve as an officer and shall verify that each candidate has, in fact, been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The election of officers shall take place on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of election&rsqb;</inline.instr> each year. Special elections may be held at such times as necessary as determined by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Election may be by written paper ballot or, if approved by the Board of Directors, by utilization of telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology. If paper ballots are employed, the Secretary shall supervise their preparation and mailing and shall take such steps as are necessary that ballots and explanations as to how they are to be marked are delivered to eligible voters at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled date of the election. If the election is conducted by means of telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology, the Secretary shall supervise the implementation of that technology and that its availability and the means of its utilization is explained to eligible voters at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled date of the election.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>G</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Ballots shall be completed and returned to the Secretary by <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of completion&rsqb;</inline.instr> in order to be valid and counted. Eligible voters may mark the ballots to indicate one choice for each office, and any ballot marked so as to indicate more than one choice for a particular office shall be invalid and the vote for that office shall not be counted. A ballot shall be valid and shall be counted even if the voter did not vote for a nominee for all offices. A dispute as to the validity of any particular ballot shall be determined by <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of manner of determining validity of ballot&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>H</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The counting of ballots, whether the voting be conducted by paper ballot or by telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology, shall be performed by three Election Judges appointed by the Secretary. No candidate for office may serve as an Election Judge. The counting of ballots shall commence within <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after the date of the election and a written record of the vote tally shall be prepared. This tally and the ballots themselves shall remain available for inspection by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for a period of not less than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>I</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The nominee receiving a plurality of the votes for each office shall be declared elected to that office. In the case of tie votes for any office, the winner shall be decided by lot.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>J</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The election results shall be promptly published on <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s website and shall also be published in the next issue of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s newsletter. Each candidate shall be informed in writing of the election results as soon as practicable and in no event later than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after the date of the election.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>7</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Powers and Duties of Officers</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The President shall serve as the chief executive of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and shall have the powers and perform the duties assigned to that role, exercising a general supervision over all the affairs of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>. The President shall also:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(i)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>preside over all meetings of the Board of Directors and of the membership;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(ii)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>appoint committees as needed to carry out the business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(iii)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>oversee and coordinate the activities of other officers;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(iv)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>negotiate contracts in behalf of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(v)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>communicate to the membership all dealings and concerns of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>; and</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(vi)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>work in conjunction with the officers, directors, committee members, and the membership at large to advance and attain the goals of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> so as to better serve the community at large and the membership of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Vice President shall serve as acting President, with all the powers and duties of that office, in the event the President is unable to serve. The Vice President shall, in the absence of the President, preside over all meeting of the Board of Directors and of the membership and shall also exercise all powers and perform all duties necessary to assist the other officers in the successful performance of their duties.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Treasurer shall take charge of all funds and assets of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and keep its books and accounts. The Treasurer shall develop a budget for <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>, subject to approval of the Board of Directors. The Treasurer shall each month present to the Board of Directors a financial statement showing the financial activities and status of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>. In addition, the treasurer shall assure that all required tax filings are made in a timely manner and shall annually obtain an audit of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s financial statements by a certified public accountant or auditor.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Secretary shall keep accurate minutes of the proceedings of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and its Board of Directors. In addition, the Secretary shall keep custody of the records of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and its Board of Directors, including records of membership, and perform specified duties in regard to elections of officers and directors for <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>All officers shall be responsible for transmitting to their successors all pertinent records, files, and correspondence within <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after the successor takes office.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>8</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Compensation and Reimbursement of Officers</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Officers shall be entitled to compensation and/or reimbursement of expenses if and to the extent the Board of Directors so authorizes. No compensation or reimbursement shall be allowed retroactively.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>9</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Insurance</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall obtain and maintain in force appropriate insurance against errors and omissions by any officer.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>V</designator><name>DIRECTORS</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Authority of Board</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Board of Directors shall be the governing body of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> and be responsible for managing its affairs. Pursuant to ARTICLE III, Section 4 of these Bylaws, the Board of Directors is empowered to expel a member for good cause.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Composition of Board</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Board of Directors shall be comprised of the officers named in ARTICLE IV, Section 1 and <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> Directors elected by the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Terms of Office</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The term of office of a Director shall be <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr> years beginning on <inline.instr>&lsqb;begin date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr> and expiring on <inline.instr>&lsqb;end date of term&rsqb;</inline.instr>. The Directors serve staggered terms so that each year the terms of <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> Directors expire and <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of new directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> new Directors are elected in their place.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Vacancies</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In the event a Director resigns, is removed, becomes incapacitated, fails to remain a member in good standing, or dies with more than <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr> remaining in his or her term, a special election shall be held to select a replacement. If less than <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr> is remaining in a Director&apos;s term when <inline.instr>&lsqb;he/she&rsqb;</inline.instr> resigns, is removed, becomes incapacitated, fails to remain a member in good standing, or dies with more than <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr>, no replacement shall be selected until the next regularly scheduled election.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>5</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Term Limits</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>A Director shall not serve more than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive terms&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive terms.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Time served as a Director pursuant to election to serve a partial term to replace a former incumbent who resigned, was removed, became incapacitated, failed to remain a member in good standing, or died shall not be considered as a term of office unless that appointee served in that office for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>6</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Qualifications for Office</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>To be eligible for nomination and election as a Director, an individual must have been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>7</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Procedures for the Nomination and Election of Directors</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Written suggestions of proposed nominees may be made by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for consideration by a nominating committee appointed by the President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The nominating committee shall submit to the Secretary a slate of eligible nominees to seek the office of Director at the election to be held in that year. In submitting this slate, the nominating committee shall consider written suggestions of proposed nominees made by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> but need not place any suggested name on the slate of nominees submitted.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Individuals desiring to serve as a Director of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> may, if not approved by the nominating committee, seek the office of Director as a &ldquo;write-in&rdquo; candidate by presenting to the Secretary <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled election a petition signed by <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr> members in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Upon receipt of a slate of candidates from the nominating committee and receipt of any petition for &ldquo;write-in&rdquo; candidacy, the Secretary shall verify that each candidate consents to serve as a Director and shall verify that each candidate has, in fact, been a member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive years&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive years.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The election of Director shall take place on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of election&rsqb;</inline.instr> each year. Special elections may be held at such times as necessary as determined by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Election may be by written paper ballot or, if approved by the Board of Directors, by utilization of telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology. If paper ballots are employed, the Secretary shall supervise their preparation and mailing and shall take such steps as are necessary that ballots and explanations as to how they are to be marked are delivered to eligible voters at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled date of the election. If the election is conducted by means of telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology, the Secretary shall supervise the implementation of that technology and that its availability and the means of its utilization is explained to eligible voters at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the scheduled date of the election.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>G</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Ballots shall be completed and returned to the Secretary by <inline.instr>&lsqb;due date of return&rsqb;</inline.instr> in order to be valid and counted. Eligible voters may mark the ballots so as to vote for a number of nominees which is equal to or less than the total number of Directors to be selected at that election. Any ballot marked so as to vote for a number of nominees larger than the total number of Directors to be elected at that election shall be invalid in its entirety. A dispute as to the validity of any particular ballot shall be determined by <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of manner of determining validity of ballot&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>H</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The counting of ballots, whether the voting be conducted by paper ballot or by telephonic, internet, or e-mail technology, shall be performed by three Election Judges appointed by the Secretary. No candidate for the office of Director may serve as an Election Judge. The counting of ballots shall commence within <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after the date of the election and a written record of the vote tally shall be prepared. This tally and the ballots themselves shall remain available for inspection by any member in good standing of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> for a period of not less than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>I</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of nominees&rsqb;</inline.instr> nominees receiving the highest number of votes shall be declared elected to serve as Directors. In the case of a tie vote, the winner shall be decided by lot.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>J</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The election results shall be promptly published on <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s website and shall also be published in the next issue of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s newsletter. Each candidate shall be informed in writing of the election results as soon as practicable and in no event later than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after the date of the election.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>8</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Compensation and Reimbursement of Officers</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Directors shall be entitled to compensation and/or reimbursement of expenses if and to the extent the Board of Directors so authorizes. No compensation or reimbursement shall be allowed retroactively.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>9</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Meetings</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The Board of Directors shall meet at least <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of times&rsqb;</inline.instr> times a year. These meetings shall take place on <inline.instr>&lsqb;dates of meetings&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Special meetings may be convened at the order of the President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Written notice of the date and location of all meetings, including special meetings, shall be delivered in person, by mail, or by e-mail not less than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days and not more than <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days before the meeting date. If all Directors meet by mutual consent at any time or place, within or outside the State of New York, such meeting shall be valid even though proper notice was not given thereof, and any action taken at such a meeting shall not be invalidated for lack of notice.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Meetings of the Board of Directors may be conducted either in person or by teleconference provided that at least one meeting must be conducted in person each year. The location of meetings conducted in person shall be specified by the President except that no meeting shall take place outside New York State without consent of the majority of the Board.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>All meetings of the Board of Directors shall be conducted in accordance with, and all issues of parliamentary procedure shall be decided by, <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of rules&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of code&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> in all instances in which those rules are applicable and in which they are not inconsistent with these Bylaws or with any special rules of order adopted by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>E</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In addition to addressing the general business of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>, the Board of Directors shall consider both unfinished and new business, as appropriate, and review and discuss minutes of prior proceedings and reports of officers and committees.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>F</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Text number of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> Directors shall constitute a quorum at meetings.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>G</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In the event of a tie vote at a regular or special meeting, the vote of the President shall prevail.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>H</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>No Director shall be entitled to vote by proxy.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>I</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>Any Director who shall be absent from <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of consecutive meetings&rsqb;</inline.instr> consecutive meetings shall be deemed to have resigned from office and shall cease to be a Director unless a majority vote of the other Directors elects that such a resignation not be deemed to have taken place.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><label>Section</label><designator>10</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Insurance</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> shall obtain and maintain in force appropriate insurance against errors and omissions by any Director.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>VI</designator><name>COMMITTEES</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>There shall be the following committees: the Nominations Committee, the Finance Committee, and the Membership Committee. Chairs of these committees shall be appointed by and serve at the pleasure of the President. The committee chair shall be empowered to appoint committee members, subject to the overruling of such action by the President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>The President may establish or dissolve additional committees to address particular issues and may appoint an individual Director to serve as Board liaison with each such committee, subject to overruling of such actions by majority vote of a quorum of the Board of Directors. The President shall be empowered to appoint or replace the chair of a committee. The committee chair shall be empowered to appoint committee members, subject to the overruling of such action by the President.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>VII</designator><name>STATE CHAPTERS</name></name.block></head>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>A</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>State chapters of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> may be established under procedures to be established by the Board of Directors. These procedures shall be subject to modification or repeal by the Board.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>B</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>State chapters shall be subject to these Bylaws.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>C</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>State chapters shall adopt Chapter Bylaws subject to approval thereof by the Board of Directors.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>D</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>In the event of dissolution of a state chapter, all its assets shall become the property of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>VIII</designator><name>AMENDMENT OF BYLAWS</name></name.block></head>
<item.selection.group type="choice">
<instruction>&lsqb;EITHER:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>These Bylaws may be amended by vote of the majority of the Board of Directors at a duly convened meeting.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
<instruction>&lsqb;OR:&rsqb;</instruction>
<item.selection>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text>These Bylaws may be amended by two-thirds vote of the corporation membership at a special election called for that purpose.</form.text></form.para>
</item.selection>
</item.selection.group></form.item>
<form.item><head><name.block><label>ARTICLE</label><designator>IX</designator><name>DISSOLUTION</name></name.block></head>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr> may be dissolved in accordance with the laws of the State of New York. Upon dissolution, all corporate assets shall be distributed as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of method of distribution&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><para.text>Bylaws for charitable corporations may place the greater portion of operational control in the board of directors, the officers, or the membership itself. Likewise, the bylaws may be specific and detailed or may be broad so as to leave refinement of details to be determined by the entity in which operational control is vested. Which path to follow in regard to operational control and the extent of detail is a philosophical and business decision. Bylaws that vest greater operational control in the board or officers and which do not impose detailed requirements may permit a speedier and more flexible response to changes; arguably, such bylaws may also permit a small group to violate the desires of the membership at large. It would appear that there is always a trade-off.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|111|30:103"><para.text>In general, the form shown above places the bulk of operation control in the Board of Directors but also sets forth how the corporation shall be run in considerable detail.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3384">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3384</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:104</designator><name>Bylaws<sep/>State or regional chapter affiliated with national nonprofit corporation</name></outline.name.block>

<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
