<form uuid="Id55c62e01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|145|30:136"><form.text>I, the undersigned, do certify:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|145|30:136"><form.text>I am the elected and acting <inline.instr>&lsqb;secretary/assistant secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|145|30:136"><form.text>The foregoing bylaws, comprising <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of pages&rsqb;</inline.instr> pages, constitute <inline.instr>&lsqb;the original bylaws of the club as adopted at the organization meeting of the incorporators/a copy of the bylaws of the club as amended at the&rsqb;</inline.instr> meeting of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;members/board of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the club, held on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr> at the club&apos;s principal office, located at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, State of New York.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|145|30:136"><form.text>In witness whereof, I have subscribed my name <inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: and affixed the corporate seal of the club&rsqb;</inline.instr> this <inline.instr>&lsqb;ordinal number of day&rsqb;</inline.instr> day of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of month&rsqb;</inline.instr> <inline.instr>&lsqb;identification of year&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;/&lsqb;Name of assistant secretary&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Secretary/Assistant Secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|145|30:136"><para.text>The initial bylaws of a not-for-profit corporation may be adopted by its incorporators at the organization meeting and, if not so adopted by the incorporators, by its board of directors. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;602(a)</cite>. Subject to the statutory provision governing limitations on the right to vote (<cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="612">N-PCL &sect;612</cite>) additional bylaws may be adopted by the members of a not-for-profit corporation at the time entitled to vote in the election of directors. In addition, unless otherwise provided in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws adopted by the members, new bylaws may be adopted by the board. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;602(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<form.name.block><name>CERTIFICATION</name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|148|30:139"><form.text>I, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of certifying officer&rsqb;</inline.instr>, certify that I am the <inline.instr>&lsqb;President/Secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation. In my capacity as <inline.instr>&lsqb;President/Secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> I have access to the corporate documents and records of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>. I certify that the attached document is a complete and correct copy of the bylaws of the corporation as they are in effect on this date. More specifically, this instrument is to certify that the attached document, consisting of <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of pages&rsqb;</inline.instr> pages, is a true and correct copy of the bylaws of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation. It is further certified that the foregoing is a conformed copy that agrees with the original document and all amendments to the original. Additionally, it is certified that the attached bylaws are in full force and effect and have not been amended or modified subsequent to the date of their adoption.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of certificate&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>

<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Acknowledgments&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|148|30:139"><para.text>The initial bylaws of a not-for-profit corporation may be adopted by its incorporators at the organization meeting and, if not so adopted by the incorporators, by its board of directors. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;602(a)</cite>. Subject to the statutory provision governing limitations on the right to vote (<cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="612">N-PCL &sect;612</cite>) additional bylaws may be adopted by the members of a not-for-profit corporation at the time entitled to vote in the election of directors. In addition, unless otherwise provided in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws adopted by the members, new bylaws may be adopted by the board. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;602(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:140</designator><name>Unanimous written consent of directors in lieu of organization meeting to action taken</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55d9b601b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>We, the undersigned, being all of the directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, hereby consent to the taking of the following action in lieu of an organization meeting pursuant to <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="708">Section 708 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law</cite>, and hereby waive any notice to be given in connection therewith pursuant to Section 711(c) of such Law:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>Resolved, by the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, that:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(1)</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Adoption of bylaws.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> hereby adopts as the bylaws of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> the form of bylaws attached to this consent as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(2)</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Election of officers.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>Each of the following persons is elected to the office set forth opposite his or her name to serve at the pleasure of the board of directors and until his or her successor has been duly elected and qualified:</form.text>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-140_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="1*"/>
<thead>
<row><entry>Name</entry><entry>Office</entry></row>
</thead>
<tbody>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry>President</entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of Vice President&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry>Vice President</entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry>Secretary</entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of treasurer&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry>Treasurer</entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(3)</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Adoption of seal.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>The form of corporate seal, conforming to the provisions of the bylaws of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> and making the following impression, is adopted as the seal of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr>:</form.text></form.para>
<form.line align="c"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Seal&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(4)</designator></name.block><form.para><form.text>Designation of bank depository.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;President/Vice President/treasurer&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> is authorized to open on behalf of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> such accounts as he or she deems necessary or appropriate at <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of bank&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and to endorse any checks, drafts, notes, orders, and bills of exchange payable to, or otherwise the property of, the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr>; to deposit them in such accounts; and to draw and sign checks on such accounts in the name of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr>. The board of directors hereby adopts any resolutions required by such bank in connection with its designation as depository, provided the President of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;club/association&rsqb;</inline.instr> instructs the secretary in writing to insert as an appendix to this consent a copy of such resolutions, which shall thereupon be deemed to have been adopted by the board of directors. <inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: However, the &lsqb;club/association&rsqb; shall borrow only in accordance with specific resolutions of the board of directors, and nothing contained here shall be construed to adopt any resolution granting blanket authority to any individual to borrow on behalf of the &lsqb;club/association&rsqb;.&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><form.text>Executed by the undersigned, as first directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on the dates indicated below.</form.text></form.para>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-140_002">
<table>

</thead>
<tbody>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of director 1&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;signature of director 1&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;date of execution&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of director 2&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;signature of director 2&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;date of execution&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of director 3&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;signature of director 3&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;date of execution&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>

</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Exhibits&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><para.text>After the corporate existence has begun, an organization meeting of the initial directors or if directors are not designated in the certificate of incorporation, of the incorporator or incorporators, must be held. The minimum agenda of the organization meeting is set by statute. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="405" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;405(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|149|30:140"><para.text>Unless otherwise restricted by the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws, any action required or permitted to be taken by the board or any committee thereof may be taken without a meeting if all members of the board or the committee consent to the adoption of a resolution authorizing the action. Such consent may be written or electronic. If written, the consent must be executed by the director by signing such consent or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such consent by any reasonable means including, but not limited to, facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the consent must be sent by electronic mail or other electronic means and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the director. The resolution and the written consents thereto by the members of the board or committee shall be filed with the minutes of the proceedings of the board or committee. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="708" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;708(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="86">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;86</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:141</designator><name>Organization meeting by directors&apos; written consent</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55dc2701b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>The undersigned, being the Directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> (the &ldquo;Corporation&rdquo;), a <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr> nonprofit corporation, hereby adopt the following resolutions by unanimous written consent:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Certificate of Incorporation of the Corporation filed on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of filing&rsqb;</inline.instr> with the <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr> Department of State, and it hereby is, ratified and approved in all respects;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Bylaws of the Corporation attached hereto as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr>, including the Conflict of Interest Policy attached as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr> to the Bylaws, are hereby approved and adopted in all respects as the bylaws of the Corporation;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that each of the officers and directors of the Corporation shall be provided with a copy of the Conflict of Interest Policy and required to execute and date a Conflict of Interest Statement and return such signed copy to the Secretary of the Corporation;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the number of Directors constituting the entire Board of Directors of the Corporation shall be <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> directors;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the following persons be, and they hereby are, nominated and elected as members of the Board of Directors of the Corporation, to serve in accordance with the Bylaws of the Corporation until their respective successors are elected and qualified: <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the following persons be, and they hereby are, elected to the offices of the Corporation set forth opposite their respective names, to serve in accordance with the Bylaws of the Corporation, and at the discretion of the Board of Directors, until their respective successors are elected and qualified: <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of names&rsqb;</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of offices&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that for the purpose of authorizing the Corporation to carry on its exempt purpose under the laws of any state as to which the officers of the Corporation determine such authorization is necessary or desirable, the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, authorized in the name and on behalf of the Corporation to take such action as may be necessary or advisable to effect the qualification of the Corporation to carry on its exempt purpose as a foreign corporation in such state or states;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, authorized to (1) designate the bank or banks in which the funds of the Corporation shall be deposited, (2) take such steps as are necessary in order to open such accounts, (3) cause to be deposited in such accounts from time to time such funds of the Corporation as the officers may deem necessary or advisable, and (4) designate from time to time officers and agents of the Corporation authorized to sign or countersign checks, drafts or other orders for the payment of money issued in the name of the Corporation against any such account;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, authorized to pay all fees and expenses incident to and necessary for the organization and qualification of the Corporation, and to reimburse any person who has made any disbursements therefor, out of the funds of the Corporation;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, authorized to execute and file for, in the name of and on behalf of the Corporation, any and all documents, certificates and instruments necessary to obtain and evidence exemptions for the corporation from federal and New York income tax and any other tax deemed appropriate by such officer or officers;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, delegated the power to accept, on behalf of the Corporation, any contribution, gift, bequest or devise, whether outright or in trust, as a current or future interest, as real or personal property, or as tangible or intangible property, for the general purposes or any special purpose of the Corporation upon such terms and conditions as such officer(s) determine are necessary or appropriate;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and they hereby are, granted full power and authority to execute and deliver all such instruments, agreements, and documents, to pay all such fees and expenses, and to perform such other acts as such officer may determine to be necessary or convenient, and in the best interests of the Corporation, from time to time hereafter, to carry on the affairs of the Corporation, with the power of delegation, all in the name of the Corporation and on the Corporation&apos;s behalf and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>RESOLVED, that any of the officers of the Corporation be, and each of them hereby is authorized, empowered and directed, in the name and on behalf of the Corporation to (1) do all such acts and things; (2) execute, deliver and file, such agreements, certificates, instruments and other documents; (3) make such changes to any of the foregoing; and (4) pay such fees and expenses, in each case as may be necessary or desirable in order to carry out the foregoing resolutions, and that all of the acts and doings of such officers and directors, whether heretofore or hereafter taken, done or performed in furtherance of the above resolutions, are hereby ratified, approved, confirmed and authorized.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>This Consent may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original but all of which together will constitute one and the same instrument. Electronic, photocopied, scanned or faxed signatures shall be treated as original signatures and shall be binding upon the signer.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|150|30:141"><form.text>IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned have signed this Consent the <inline.instr>&lsqb;ordinal number of day&rsqb;</inline.instr> day of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of month&rsqb;</inline.instr> <inline.instr>&lsqb;identification of year&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>

</research.reference.block>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:142</designator><name>Minutes of directors&apos; organization meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55e10901b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Pursuant to <inline.instr>&lsqb;notice/call and waiver of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr>, the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, elected <inline.instr>&lsqb;at the first meeting of the membership held on &lsqb;date of first meeting&rsqb;/by unanimous written consent of the members in lieu of a meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, assembled and held its first meeting at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of first meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of first meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Present at the meeting were <inline.instr>&lsqb;names of all directors present&rsqb;</inline.instr>, being all of the directors.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of temporary party&rsqb;</inline.instr> called the meeting to order and, on motion duly made and seconded, was appointed temporary <inline.instr>&lsqb;chairperson/&lsqb;title of entity&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>; <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of temporary secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> was appointed temporary secretary.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>The election of officers was thereupon declared in order, and the following were duly elected: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President; <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of Vice President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Vice President; <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, secretary; and <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of treasurer&rsqb;</inline.instr>, treasurer. <inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr> took the chair and presided at the meeting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>The <inline.instr>&lsqb;chairperson/&lsqb;title of entity&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> then announced that the certificate of incorporation had been duly filed with the Department of State on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of filing certificate of incorporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>. The secretary was instructed to cause a copy of the certificate of incorporation to be inserted in the front of the minute and bylaw book of the club.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>The secretary then presented a proposed form of bylaws for the club, which were read and considered, section by section. On motion duly made, seconded, and carried, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Resolved, that the bylaws submitted by the secretary and read to this meeting are hereby adopted as the bylaws of the club, and the secretary is hereby instructed to certify two copies of the bylaws, one copy to be inserted in the minute book, the other to be kept at the principal office of the club and to be open to inspection by members at all reasonable times during office hours.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>On motion duly made, seconded, and carried, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Resolved, that the form of corporate seal, conforming to the provisions of the bylaws, and making the following impression, is adopted as the seal of the club:</form.text></form.para>
<form.line align="c"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Seal&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>The secretary was authorized and directed to procure all appropriate corporate books.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>On motion duly made, seconded, and carried, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Resolved, that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of bank&rsqb;</inline.instr> is hereby selected as a depository for the monies, funds, and credit of the club, and that <inline.instr>&lsqb;names of employees&rsqb;</inline.instr>, or any two of them, are authorized and empowered to draw checks (including checks payable to their own order or to bearer) on the above depository against the account of the club, and to endorse in the name of the club and receive payment of all checks, drafts, and commercial paper payable to the club either as payee or as endorsee;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Further resolved, that the authority hereby conferred shall remain in full force and effect until revoked, and until a formal written notice of revocation has been given to and received by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of bank&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Further resolved, that the certification of the secretary of the club as to the appointment of persons authorized as signatories of the club shall be binding on the club;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Further resolved, that the secretary of the club is hereby authorized and directed to deliver to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of bank&rsqb;</inline.instr> a copy of these resolutions properly certified by <inline.instr>&lsqb;him/her&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>On motion duly made, seconded, and carried, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>Resolved, that the principal office of the club for the transaction of business is hereby fixed at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><form.text>There being no further business, the meeting was adjourned.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of minutes&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|151|30:142"><para.text>The above minutes are intended as an outline of a meeting of newly elected directors following the annual meeting of the membership. It is assumed that the power to alter, amend, or repeal bylaws or to adopt new bylaws of this particular corporation rests with the board of directors as well as with the members, as is permitted by <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;602(b)</cite>. If the members have exclusive power in this area, the minutes will have to be altered accordingly.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="86, 607" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;86, 607</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:143</designator><name>Minutes of regular meeting following annual membership meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55e37a01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|152|30:143"><form.text>A meeting of the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> was held at the office of the club immediately following the annual meeting of members on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>; all directors were present in person.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|152|30:143"><form.text>On motion unanimously carried, the following officers were elected: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President; <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of Vice President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Vice President; <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, secretary; and <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of treasurer&rsqb;</inline.instr>, treasurer.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|152|30:143"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Description of other business transacted&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|152|30:143"><form.text>No further business appearing, the meeting was adjourned.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of minutes&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:144</designator><name>Minutes of special meeting of board of directors</name></outline.name.block>

<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55e5eb01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text>The board of directors met pursuant to <inline.instr>&lsqb;notice/call and waiver of notice/unanimous consent, all directors being present&rsqb;</inline.instr> in special meeting on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, in the office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text>The meeting was called to order by the President, and <inline.instr>&lsqb;names of directors present&rsqb;</inline.instr> answered present, they being all the members of the board.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text>The secretary then presented the <inline.instr>&lsqb;notice of meeting/call and waiver/written consent&rsqb;</inline.instr> pursuant to which the meeting was held. There being no objection, the <inline.instr>&lsqb;notice of meeting/call and waiver/written consent&rsqb;</inline.instr> was ordered entered in the minutes, and the same is set forth below.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Insertion of notice of meeting/call and waiver/written consent&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text>The President then called the board&apos;s attention to the purposes for which the meeting was held.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Description of proceedings&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><form.text>There being no further business, the meeting was adjourned.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of minutes&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><para.text>Special meetings of the board of directors must be held on notice to the directors. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(a)">N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corp. Law &sect;711(a)</cite>. Notice of a meeting need not be given to any alternate director, nor to any director who submits a signed waiver of notice whether before or after the meeting, or who attends the meeting without protesting, prior to such meeting or at its commencement, the lack of notice to such director.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|153|30:144"><para.text>The bylaws may prescribe what will constitute notice of a meeting of the board. A notice or waiver of notice need not specify the purpose of any regular or special meeting of the board unless required by the bylaws. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;711(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="595 to 607" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;595 to 607</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:145</designator><name>Resolution to adopt whistleblowers&apos; policy</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55e85c01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> is committed to upholding the highest standards of ethical, moral and legal business conduct, and to transparency through open communication, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, trustees, officers, employees and volunteers of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> are required to comply with applicable federal, state and local laws, and must faithfully implement and adhere to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s own policies and procedures in conducting their duties and responsibilities, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, in accordance with the New York State Non-Profit Revitalization Act of 2013 (&ldquo;the Act&rdquo;), <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> must adopt a Whistleblower Policy to protect from retaliation persons who report suspected improper conduct, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, this provides an avenue for trustees, officers, employees and volunteers of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> to report any suspected or actual conduct contrary to these standards without the fear of intimidation, harassment, discrimination or retaliation, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, this policy contains procedures for oversight, reporting, handling and investigating allegations of improper conduct as required under the Act, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, the <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of committee&rsqb;</inline.instr> Committee shall oversee the Whistleblower Policy, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, this policy document has been reviewed and approved by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s legal counsel, and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>WHEREAS, the <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of committee&rsqb;</inline.instr> Committee has reviewed this policy and recommends it for approval by the Board, now, therefore, be it</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Board of Trustees of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> adopts the proposed Whistleblower Policy, and be it finally</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><form.text>RESOLVED, that copies of this adopted policy shall apply to and be distributed to trustees, officers, employees and volunteers of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> at the time of appointment or hiring, and annually thereafter.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|154|30:145"><para.text>For a discussion of the requirement to adopt a whistleblower policy, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:49">&sect;30:49</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:146</designator><name>Resolution to adopt conflict of interest policy</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55eacd01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>WHEREAS, the Corporation is a New York not-for-profit corporation subject to the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>WHEREAS, the Nonprofit Revitalization Act, which was signed into law on December 18, 2013, made several changes to the provisions of the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law that govern how not-for-profit corporations address scenarios that pose a conflict of interest; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>WHEREAS, in light of the foregoing, the Board wishes to amend its Policy on Conflict of Interest and Disclosure to reflect the changes of the Nonprofit Revitalization Act;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>NOW THEREFORE, it is hereby</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Amended and Restated Policy on Conflict of Interest and Disclosure in the form attached hereto as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr> be, and hereby is, approved, ratified and adopted as and for the Policy on Conflict of Interest and Disclosure of the Corporation (the &ldquo;Conflict of Interest Policy&rdquo;), and that the Secretary of the Corporation be, and hereby is, instructed to file a copy of such Conflict of Interest Policy in the Corporation&apos;s minute book; and it is further</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the officers of the Corporation be, and each of them hereby is, authorized and directed to take any and all further action and to execute, deliver and file any and all instruments and documents in the name and on behalf of the Corporation, and to pay any and all fees and expenses, as in his or her judgment may be necessary or advisable in order to carry out the intent and purpose of the foregoing resolutions.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|155|30:146"><para.text>For a discussion of the requirement to adopt a conflict of interest policy, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:50">&sect;30:50</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3350 to 3499" numrange="y">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3350 to 3499</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>

<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55ed3e01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I, <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of officer&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of director&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of key employee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, acknowledge the following:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I have received a copy of the Conflict of Interest Policy of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, adopted as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr> to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s Bylaws on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of adoption&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I have read and understand the Policy and agree to comply with the Policy;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I will disclose any potential conflicts, other than those stated below, as they may arise before completion of my next conflict of interest statement; and</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I understand that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> is a charitable organization and in order to maintain its federal tax exemption it must engage primarily in activities which accomplish one or more of its tax-exempt purposes.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>5</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>I am an officer, director, trustee, member, owner (either as a sole proprietor or a partner), or employee of the following entities with which <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> has a relationship: <inline.instr>&lsqb;None/&lsqb;identification of entities and statement of interest&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>6</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text>A relative of mine is an officer, director, trustee, member, owner (either as a sole proprietor or a partner), or employee of the following entities with which <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> has a relationship: <inline.instr>&lsqb;None/&lsqb;identification of entities and statement of interest&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>7</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> is a party to the following potential or pending transactions in which I have a direct or indirect interest: <inline.instr>&lsqb;None/&lsqb;description of transactions&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>8</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> is a party to the following potential or pending transactions in which a relative of mine has a direct or indirect interest: <inline.instr>&lsqb;None/&lsqb;description of transactions&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of signature&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;Name of officer&rsqb;/&lsqb;Name of director&rsqb;/&lsqb;Name of key employee&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><para.text>The conflict of interest policy must require that prior to the initial election of any director, and annually thereafter, such director must complete, sign and submit to the secretary of the corporation or a designated compliance officer a written statement identifying, to the best of the director&apos;s knowledge, any entity of which such director is an officer, director, trustee, member, owner (either as a sole proprietor or a partner), or employee and with which the corporation has a relationship, and any transaction in which the corporation is a participant and in which the director might have a conflicting interest. The policy must require that each director annually resubmit such written statement. The secretary of the corporation or the designated compliance officer must provide a copy of all completed statements to the chair of the audit committee or, if there is no audit committee, to the chair of the board. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="715-a" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;715-a(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><para.text>For a discussion of the requirement to adopt a conflict of interest policy, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:50">&sect;30:50</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|156|30:147"><para.text><cite type="case">Ferris v. Lustgarten Foundation, 189 A.D.3d 1002, 138 N.Y.S.3d 517 (2d Dep&apos;t 2020)</cite> stating that the statute governing whistleblower policy of not-for-profit corporations created private right of action for employees who were retaliated against or subject to adverse employment consequences as a result of whistleblowing activities, where the statute was intended to protect employees who reported suspect actions of corporations in good faith, the legislative purpose was promoted by holding corporations accountable for retaliation against whistleblowers, and there was no regulatory agency to enforce a not-for-profit corporation&apos;s compliance with the statute.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3350 to 3499" numrange="y">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3350 to 3499</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:147.40</designator><name>Resolution designating depository</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of depository&rsqb;</inline.instr> is designated as depository of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> and that funds of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> deposited in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of depository&rsqb;</inline.instr> be subject to withdrawal upon checks, notes, drafts, bills of exchange, acceptances, undertakings of other orders for the payment of money when signed on behalf of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> by <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the following officers: <inline.instr>&lsqb;names and titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3425">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3425</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:147.50</designator><name>Resolution approving financial report</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that the financial statements for the fiscal year ended <inline.instr>&lsqb;end date of fiscal year&rsqb;</inline.instr>, as presented to the meeting, are accepted by the Members as the Annual Report of Directors under Section 519 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para><para.text>The board must present at the annual meeting of members a report, verified by the president and treasurer or by a majority of the directors, or certified by an independent public or certified public accountant or a firm of such accountants selected by the board, showing in appropriate detail the following:</para.text>
<list list.style="para">
<list.item><name.block><designator>(1)</designator></name.block><para><para.text>The assets and liabilities, including the trust funds, of the corporation as of the end of a 12 month fiscal period terminating not more than six months prior to said meeting.</para.text></para></list.item>
<list.item><name.block><designator>(2)</designator></name.block><para><para.text>The principal changes in assets and liabilities, including trust funds, during said fiscal period.</para.text></para></list.item>
<list.item><name.block><designator>(3)</designator></name.block><para><para.text>The revenue or receipts of the corporation, both unrestricted and restricted to particular purposes during said fiscal period.</para.text></para></list.item>
<list.item><name.block><designator>(4)</designator></name.block><para><para.text>The expenses or disbursements of the corporation, for both general and restricted purposes, during said fiscal period.</para.text></para></list.item>
<list.item><name.block><designator>(5)</designator></name.block><para><para.text>The number of members of the corporation as of the date of the report, together with a statement of increase or decrease in such number during said fiscal period, and a statement of the place where the names and places of residence of the current members may be found.</para.text></para></list.item>
</list></para>
<para><para.text>The annual report of directors must be filed with the records of the corporation and either a copy or an abstract thereof entered in the minutes of the proceedings of the annual meeting of members. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="519">N-PCL &sect;519</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3390">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3390</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|157|30:148"><form.text>Resolved, that beginning with the present meeting of directors, a fee of &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of fee per meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr> per meeting shall be paid to each nonsalaried member of the board of directors who actually attends a regular or special meeting of the board of directors of the club.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|157|30:148"><para.text>A not-for-profit corporation is permitted to pay reasonable compensation to its members, directors, and officers for services rendered. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="515" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;515(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|158|30:149"><form.text>Further resolved, that the salary of the treasurer of the club for services rendered to the club as treasurer shall be &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of salary&rsqb;</inline.instr> for <inline.instr>&lsqb;fiscal/calendar&rsqb;</inline.instr> year <inline.instr>&lsqb;identification of year&rsqb;</inline.instr>, payable in such manner and at such times as the board shall direct.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|158|30:149"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Titles of other corporate officers and their respective salaries&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>

<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:149.50</designator><name>Resolution authorizing compensation of officers</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>

<section.body>
<form>
<form.para><form.text>WHEREAS some of the offices held by officers of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> require substantial time commitment, on the order of hundreds of hours per year,</form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>WHEREAS the ongoing and timely performance of these officers is critical to the continued existence of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>,</form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>NOW THEREFORE, it is hereby</form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that effective <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of effective date&rsqb;</inline.instr>, the following officers of the corporation will receive compensation, paid <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of time period&rsqb;</inline.instr>: <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of titles of offices and dollar amounts of compensation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|158|30:149"><para.text>A not-for-profit corporation is permitted to pay reasonable compensation to its members, directors, and officers for services rendered. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="515" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;515(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:150</designator><name>Minutes of annual members&apos; meeting; election of directors</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55f70201b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>MINUTES OF ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP MEETINGOF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CLUB&rsqb;</inline.instr></name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The annual meeting of the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, was held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, New York, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, for the purpose of electing a board of directors to serve for the ensuing year, considering reports of the affairs of the club, and transacting such other business as might come before the meeting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;The members entitled to vote who were present were as follows: &lsqb;names of members&rsqb;/There were present &lsqb;number of members&rsqb; members entitled to vote&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The total number of members entitled to vote being <inline.instr>&lsqb;total number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr>, it was announced that a quorum was present for the transaction of business.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The President, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of president&rsqb;</inline.instr>, called the meeting to order and presided during its deliberations, and <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> acted as secretary of the meeting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The secretary certified that the meeting had been duly called, in accordance with the terms of the bylaws of the club, under and by means of a notice, duly mailed in writing to the members of the club, in the manner provided for by the bylaws. A copy of the notice immediately precedes the minutes of this meeting in the book of minutes of this club.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;No objection being made, reading of the minutes of the last meeting of the members was dispensed with and, on motion duly made, seconded, and carried, the same were unanimously approved without reading/The secretary, on request, read the minutes of the annual meeting of the members of the company, held on &lsqb;date of annual meeting&rsqb;, and they were on motion duly made, seconded, passed, and approved as read&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The secretary of the meeting then read the annual report of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/President&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the club, together with the statement of income or profit and loss and the balance sheet of the club for the year ending <inline.instr>&lsqb;identification of year&rsqb;</inline.instr>, which are attached. After due discussion, it was moved, seconded, and unanimously carried that the annual report of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;board of directors/President&rsqb;</inline.instr> be accepted and filed, and the statement of income or profit and loss and balance sheets, as submitted with such report, on motion duly made, seconded, and carried, were unanimously accepted. They are attached, following these minutes.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>The President stated that the next business before the meeting was the election of a board of directors to serve for the ensuing year and called attention to the possibility of electing the directors by cumulative voting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: The following were then nominated for the office of directors: &lsqb;names of nominees&rsqb;. There being no further nominations, nominations were closed. On motion duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, the secretary was instructed to cast the ballots of all present and represented, in favor of the above candidates, allotting an equal number of the votes cast to each of them. The votes having been so cast, the following persons were declared to be the duly elected directors of the club for the ensuing year, or until the election and qualification of their successors: &lsqb;names of elected directors&rsqb;.&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Description of proceedings concerning transaction of other business that came before meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text>There being no further business to transact, the meeting was adjourned.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l">By:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Attested:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Corporate seal&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<attachment.block>
<attachment>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: The following members or persons entitled to vote waive any deficiency of notice, consent to the holding of the meeting, approve the above minutes, and ratify and affirm all actions taken at the meeting: &lsqb;names of members or persons entitled to vote&rsqb;.&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
</attachment>
</attachment.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><para.text>The first optional clause is applicable if a slate of candidates is elected without opposition.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><para.text>The second optional clause can be inserted in the minutes of small incorporated clubs or associations.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><para.text>A meeting of the members shall be held annually for the election of directors and the transaction of other business on a date fixed by or under the bylaws. Failure to hold the annual meeting on the date so fixed or to elect a sufficient number of directors to conduct the business of the corporation will not work a forfeiture or give cause for dissolution of the corporation, except as provided in the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law provisions relating to judicial dissolution in the event of deadlock among directors or members. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="603" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;603(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|159|30:150"><para.text>At each election for directors, each member may, if provided in the certificate of incorporation or bylaws, cumulate his or her votes and give one candidate a number of votes equal to the number of directors to be elected multiplied by the number of votes to which the member is entitled, or he or she may distribute the votes on the same principle among as many candidates as he or she sees fit. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="617">N-PCL &sect;617</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3409">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3409</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3412">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3412</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="908, 917" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;908, 917</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
