</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id55fbe401b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>MINUTES OF ANNUAL MEETING OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CORPORATION&rsqb;</inline.instr> Held <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr></name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>Present&mdash; <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr> members.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President, yielded the chair to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of Vice President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Vice President of Board of Trustees.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President, called on the Executive Secretary, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of executive secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, to read the call of the meeting. <inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of executive secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> read the following: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of call of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of Vice President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Vice President, called upon the Executive Secretary to read the minutes of the last meeting, and on motion, duly seconded and carried, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>Resolved, that the minutes of the last meeting of <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of last meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr> be approved as read.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President, directed the Executive Secretary to read the report of the Nominating Committee, which was read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of provisions of report&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of nominee&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Nominee, is nominated to succeed <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporate officer&rsqb;</inline.instr>, who after an urgent appeal has declared <inline.instr>&lsqb;he/she&rsqb;</inline.instr> could serve no longer. All other candidates are renominated.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person&rsqb;</inline.instr> was recognized by the Chair. <inline.instr>&lsqb;He/She&rsqb;</inline.instr> spoke as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of words of person&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of President&rsqb;</inline.instr>, President, asked that <inline.instr>&lsqb;citation of bylaw&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the existing bylaws be read. They are as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of bylaws&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of executive secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Executive Secretary, then presented and moved for adoption the following proposed amendments to the bylaws of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>. They are as follows:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Recitation of proposed amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of movant 1&rsqb;</inline.instr>, seconded by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of seconding party 1&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and carried it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>Resolved that the amendments to the bylaws proposed by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of executive secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Executive Secretary, with the exception of <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of exception&rsqb;</inline.instr>, are adopted.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>The Chair called for a vote by the showing of hands and the resolution was unanimously carried.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of movant 2&rsqb;</inline.instr> then moved for the adoption of the following amendment to the bylaws: <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of amendment&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of movant 3&rsqb;</inline.instr>, seconded by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of seconding party 2&rsqb;</inline.instr> and carried unanimously, it was</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>Resolved, that the above amendment be adopted.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of offeror&rsqb;</inline.instr> then offered <inline.instr>&lsqb;his/her&rsqb;</inline.instr> proposed <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of proposal&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the bylaws as originally read.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of movant 4&rsqb;</inline.instr> offered an amendment to <inline.instr>&lsqb;accept a vote by a written signature proxy/&lsqb;specification of amendment&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and this was accepted by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of acceptor&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion, duly made, seconded, and unanimously carried, it was <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of discussion&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of movant 5&rsqb;</inline.instr>, seconded by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of seconding party 3&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and carried, the following members of the corporation were placed in nomination for election as Trustees: <inline.instr>&lsqb;names of members nominated for election as trustees&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Recitation of discussion&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of movant 6&rsqb;</inline.instr>, seconded by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of seconding party 4&rsqb;</inline.instr>, the report of the Treasurer was received with a rising vote of thanks.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of movant 7&rsqb;</inline.instr>, seconded by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of seconding party 5&rsqb;</inline.instr> and carried, the nominations were closed.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text>On motion duly made, seconded, and carried, the nominees were unanimously elected.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Recitation of statement by new President&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of executive secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><para.text>A meeting of the members shall be held annually for the election of directors and the transaction of other business on a date fixed by or under the bylaws. Failure to hold the annual meeting on the date so fixed or to elect a sufficient number of directors to conduct the business of the corporation will not work a forfeiture or give cause for dissolution of the corporation, except as provided in the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law provisions relating to judicial dissolution in the event of deadlock among directors or members. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="603" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;603(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><para.text>At each election for directors, each member may, if provided in the certificate of incorporation or bylaws, cumulate his or her votes and give one candidate a number of votes equal to the number of directors to be elected multiplied by the number of votes to which the member is entitled, or he or she may distribute the votes on the same principle among as many candidates as he or she sees fit. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="617">N-PCL &sect;617</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|160|30:151"><para.text>The board of directors has the power to make, alter, and repeal the bylaws unless that power is reserved to the members in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws, but bylaws made by the board may be altered or repealed, and new bylaws may be made, by the members. The members may prescribe in the bylaws that any bylaw made by them shall not be altered or repealed by the board. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="602">N-PCL &sect;602</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3409">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3409</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3412">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3412</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="908, 917" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;908, 917</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>

<caption.block ref="manual">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</caption.block>
<form.name.block><name>SPECIAL MEETING OF MEMBERS</name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>Date: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting of members&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>A special meeting of the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> was held on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr> at the <inline.instr>&lsqb;principal/registered&rsqb;</inline.instr> office of the club located at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr> pursuant to a call by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of person or persons who issued call&rsqb;</inline.instr> for the purpose of <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of purpose stated in notice&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>Notice was <inline.instr>&lsqb;duly given as shown by the secretary&apos;s affidavit attached to these minutes/waived by all absent members as shown by the signed waivers attached to these minutes&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of chairperson&rsqb;</inline.instr> chaired the meeting, and <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr> acted as secretary.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>The call of the list of members showed that <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr> of members eligible to vote were present, constituting a quorum.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>On motion duly made and carried by the affirmative vote of <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of members&rsqb;</inline.instr> members eligible to vote, the following resolution was adopted:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Recitation of resolution&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><form.text>On motion duly made and carried, the meeting adjourned.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">

<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>

<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Corporate seal&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|161|30:152"><para.text>Special meetings of the members may be called by the board of directors and by such person(s) as may be authorized by the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws. In any case, a special meeting of members entitled to vote may be called by such members having one-tenth of the votes entitled to be cast at such meeting. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="603" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;603(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<online.view>

<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>

<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5600c601b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|162|30:153"><form.text>Resolved by the directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> that a special assessment shall be levied on the members of such club in the amount of &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of assessment per member&rsqb;</inline.instr> per member.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|162|30:153"><form.text>The secretary of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> is directed to notify the members of this assessment. Such assessment shall be due and payable <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of days&rsqb;</inline.instr> days after notification by the secretary.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|162|30:153"><para.text>Initiation fees, dues, or assessments may be levied on all classes of members alike or in different amounts or proportions for different classes of members, as the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws may provide, but in all cases the fees, dues, and assessments payable by members of one class shall be determined upon the same basis. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;507(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3404">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3404</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="828, 829" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;828, 829</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:154</designator><name>Resolution by directors delegating authority to executive committee</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56033701b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|164|30:154"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Recitation of bylaws providing for appointment of executive committee and that such appointment is desirable&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|164|30:154"><form.text>Resolved that <inline.instr>&lsqb;names of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> constitute an executive committee of this board to manage the affairs of this club as if a full quorum of this board were so acting and that <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of procedure of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|164|30:154"><para.text>The certificate of incorporation, the bylaws, or the board may create committees of the board, each consisting of three or more directors. The board will appoint the members of such committee of the board, except that in the case of any executive committee or similar committee however denominated, the appointment will be made by a majority of the entire board, provided that in the case of a board of 30 members or more, the appointment will be made by at least three-quarters of the directors present at the time of the vote, if a quorum is present at that time. In addition, the bylaws may provide that directors who are the holders of certain positions in the corporation must be ex-officio members of specific committees. To the extent provided in the resolution, in the certificate of incorporation, or in the bylaws, each committee will have and may exercise all the authority of the board, with certain important exceptions enumerated in the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="712" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;712(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="592 to 594" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;592 to 594</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:154.50</designator><name>Resolution ratifying actions by the board</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that any and all actions heretofore taken by the directors or officers of the Corporation, for and on behalf of the Corporation, are hereby ratified, confirmed, and approved in their entirety, and it is further;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that the directors and officers of the Corporation be, and the same hereby are, authorized, empowered, and directed to do all things and acts and to execute all documents as may be necessary or advisable and properly carry on the business of the Corporation.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3425">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3425</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:155</designator><name>Complaint to governing body regarding fine, suspension, or expulsion of member</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56081901b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-155_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="19*"/>
<tbody>
<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of governing body&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;address of governing body&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>,</entry></row>
<row><entry>State of New York</entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|165|30:155"><form.text>I, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of organization&rsqb;</inline.instr>, allege that there is reasonable cause to believe that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of accused member&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a member of this organization, has <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of accused member&apos;s actions&rsqb;</inline.instr>, in violation of <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of rule alleged to be violated&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|165|30:155"><form.text>Demand is made that appropriate hearing and notice of such hearing be afforded to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of accused member&rsqb;</inline.instr> and that <inline.instr>&lsqb;title of entity&rsqb;</inline.instr>, after such hearing, fine, suspend, or expel <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of accused member&rsqb;</inline.instr> or take such other action with respect to the matter as <inline.instr>&lsqb;title of entity&rsqb;</inline.instr> may deem proper.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of complaint&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|165|30:155"><para.text>If authorized by its certificate of incorporation or bylaws and subject to any limitations stated in such documents, a corporation may impose reasonable fines or other penalties upon its members for violations of its rules and regulations. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;507(a)</cite>. Additionally, the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws may contain such provisions as are deemed necessary to enforce fines or other penalties, including provisions for the termination of membership, upon reasonable notice, for nonpayment of such fines or other penalties. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>; see also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite> holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3404">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3404</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="831 to 834" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;831 to 834</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section.body>
<form uuid="Id560a8a01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|166|30:156"><form.text>Resolved that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of accused member&rsqb;</inline.instr> has been found guilty of a violation of Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Section <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of section&rsqb;</inline.instr>, of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;Bylaws/Certificate of Incorporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> of this club in that <inline.instr>&lsqb;he/she&rsqb;</inline.instr>: <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of charges on which member has been found guilty, including places and dates&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|166|30:156"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of accused member&rsqb;</inline.instr> is <inline.instr>&lsqb;suspended from membership in &lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb; from &lsqb;begin date of suspension&rsqb; until &lsqb;end date of suspension&rsqb;/expelled from membership in &lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb; effective &lsqb;effective date of expulsion&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|166|30:156"><para.text>If authorized by its certificate of incorporation or bylaws and subject to any limitations stated in such documents, a corporation may impose reasonable fines or other penalties upon its members for violations of its rules and regulations. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;507(a)</cite>. Additionally, the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws may contain such provisions as are deemed necessary to enforce fines or other penalties, including provisions for the termination of membership, upon reasonable notice, for nonpayment of such fines or other penalties. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>. See also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite>, holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:157</designator><name>Resolution suspending or expelling member<sep/>Nonpayment of dues or assessments</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id560cfb01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|167|30:157"><form.text>It appearing that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a member of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, has not paid <inline.instr>&lsqb;the annual dues/a duly levied assessment&rsqb;</inline.instr>, due and payable effective <inline.instr>&lsqb;effective date of payment&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr> has remained in default since that date, and, the secretary having notified <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr> on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notification&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the default, and that membership would be subject to forfeiture if the sum was not paid by <inline.instr>&lsqb;due date of payment&rsqb;</inline.instr>;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|167|30:157"><form.text>It is therefore resolved, pursuant to Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Section <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of section&rsqb;</inline.instr>, of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;Certificate of Incorporation/Bylaws&rsqb;</inline.instr> of this club, that all rights of membership of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr> and any rights or interest of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr> in the property of the club are forfeited for nonpayment of <inline.instr>&lsqb;dues/the assessment&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|167|30:157"><para.text>The certificate of incorporation or the bylaws may contain such provisions as are deemed necessary to enforce fines or other penalties, including provisions for the termination of membership, upon reasonable notice, for nonpayment of such fines or other penalties. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>. See also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite>, holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3402">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3402</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<analytical.level>
<front>
<outline.name.block>
<designator>b</designator><name>Meetings; Calls and Notices</name></outline.name.block>
</front>
<analytical.level.body>
<section.block>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:158</designator><name>Call and waiver of notice of directors&apos; organization meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56144e01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|168|30:158"><form.text>We, the undersigned, being all of the directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, hereby call the first meeting of the board of directors of such club, to be held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of first meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of first meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, and by this call waive any and all requirements as to notice of the time, place, and purposes of such meeting and consent that the meeting be held at the time and place set forth above for the purpose of transacting any business whatsoever that may be brought before the meeting, including without limitation, the adoption of bylaws, election of officers, and such other business as may come before the meeting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|168|30:158"><para.text>Regular meetings of the board of directors may be held without notice if the time and place of such meetings are fixed by the bylaws. Special meetings of the board of directors must be held on notice to the directors. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;711(a)</cite>. Notice of a meeting need not be given to any alternate director nor to any director who submits a waiver of notice whether before or after the meeting or who attends the meeting without protesting, prior thereto or at its commencement, the lack of notice to such director. Such waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the director signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means including but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the director. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;711(c)</cite>. Consequently, careful note of the directors present at each meeting should be taken in the corporate minutes.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|168|30:158"><para.text>The first or organization meeting of the initial directors is to be held at the call of any director who must give at least five days&apos; notice of such meeting by mail to each other director, which notice must set forth the time and place of the meeting. Notice need not be given to any director who submits a signed waiver of notice before or after the meeting or who attends the meeting without protesting, prior to or at its commencement, the lack of notice to him or her. If there are more than two directors, a majority will constitute a quorum and the act of the majority will be the act of the directors. A director may act at an organization meeting by proxy or by an attorney-in-fact. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="405" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;405(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|168|30:158"><para.text>The minimum agenda for the organization is set by statute. It includes: (1) adopting bylaws; (2) electing directors to hold office as provided in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws; and (3) transacting such other business as may come before the meeting. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="405" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;405(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|168|30:158"><para.text>The bylaws may prescribe what will constitute notice of a meeting of the board. A notice or waiver of notice need not specify the purpose of any regular or special meeting of the board, unless required by the bylaws. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;711(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="600">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;600</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:159</designator><name>Call of directors&apos; meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5616bf01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.line align="l">To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Secretary of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|169|30:159"><form.text>Pursuant to the provisions of Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Section <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of section&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the bylaws of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a <inline.instr>&lsqb;regular/special&rsqb;</inline.instr> meeting of the board of directors is hereby called for <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at the office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of calling of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporate officer&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of corporate officer&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|169|30:159"><para.text>Statutory provisions concerning notice of meetings of the board of directors of a not-for-profit corporation are set forth at <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711">N-PCL &sect;711</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="598 to 600" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;598 to 600</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>

</section.body>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:160</designator><name>Notice of directors&apos; meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56193001b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.line align="l">To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of director&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Director of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|170|30:160"><form.text>Notice is hereby given that a <inline.instr>&lsqb;regular/special&rsqb;</inline.instr> meeting of the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> will be held on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at the office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr> <inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: for the following purposes: &lsqb;list of purposes&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|170|30:160"><para.text>Neither the business to be transacted at nor the purpose of any regular or special meeting of the board of directors need be specified in the notice, unless required by the bylaws. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;711(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:161</designator><name>Waiver of notice of directors&apos; meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id561ba101b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|171|30:161"><form.text>The undersigned members of the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> waive notice of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;regular/special&rsqb;</inline.instr> meeting of the board to be held at the office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of waiver of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of members&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|171|30:161"><para.text>Notice of any meeting need not be given to any director who submits a waiver of notice, either before or after the meeting. Such waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the director signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means including but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the director. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;711(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3423">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3423</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="600">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;600</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:162</designator><name>Notice to absent directors of adjournment for lack of a quorum</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>

<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>

</online.view>

<section.body>
<form uuid="Id561e1201b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.line align="l">To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of director&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Director of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.line>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|172|30:162"><form.text>Notice is hereby given that the <inline.instr>&lsqb;regular/special&rsqb;</inline.instr> meeting of the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, called for <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at the office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, was adjourned for lack of a quorum. The meeting was postponed to <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of postponed meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of postponed meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at the same location. Please arrange to attend if at all possible in order to enable the board to transact necessary business.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|172|30:162"><para.text>The necessity for giving notice of adjournments of directors&apos; meetings is ordinarily regulated by the bylaws. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="711" subref="(d)">N-PCL &sect;711(d)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:163</designator><name>Notice of annual meeting</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56208301b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF MEMBERSOF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CLUB&rsqb;</inline.instr></name></form.name.block>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-163_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="19*"/>
<tbody>
<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;address of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><form.text>Notice is hereby given that the annual meeting of members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> will be held at the office of the club, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of annual meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><form.text>The purposes of the annual meeting are as follows:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><form.text>To elect directors for the ensuing year;</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><form.text>To receive and consider reports of the affairs of the club; and</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><form.text>To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><para.text>Written notice must state the place, date and hour of the meeting, the means of electronic communication, if any, by which members may participate in the proceedings of the meeting and, unless it is an annual meeting, indicate that it is being issued by or at the direction of the person or persons calling the meeting. Notice of a special meeting must also state the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called. A copy of the notice of any meeting must be given, personally, by mail, or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, to each member entitled to vote at such meeting. If the notice is given personally, by first class mail or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, it must be given not less than 10 nor more than 50 days before the date of the meeting; if mailed by any other class of mail, it must be given not less than 30 nor more than 60 days before such date. If mailed, such notice is given when deposited in the United States mail, with postage thereon prepaid, directed to the member at his or her address as it appears on the record of members, or, if he or she has filed with the secretary of the corporation a written request that notices to him or her be mailed to some other address, then directed to him of her at such other address. If sent by facsimile telecommunication or mailed electronically, such notice is given when directed to the member&apos;s fax number or electronic mail address as it appears on the record of members, or, to such fax number or other electronic mail address as filed with the secretary of the corporation. Notwithstanding the foregoing, such notice shall not be deemed to have been given electronically (1) if the corporation is unable to deliver two consecutive notices to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail; or (2) the corporation otherwise becomes aware that notice cannot be delivered to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="605" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;605(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|173|30:163"><para.text>For statutory provisions regarding fixing a record date for voting, see <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="611">N-PCL &sect;611</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3411">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3411</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="alr3" titlename="Participation in meeting as waiver of compliance with notice requirement for shareholders&apos; meeting" volref="64" pageref="358">Participation in meeting as waiver of compliance with notice requirement for shareholders&apos; meeting, 64 A.L.R.3d 358</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="901 to 907" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;901 to 907</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5622f401b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF MEMBERS</name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|174|30:164"><form.text>NOTICE is given to the Members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, that the annual meeting of Members will be held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;location of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr> at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, for the following purposes:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(a)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|174|30:164"><form.text>To elect <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of directors&rsqb;</inline.instr> directors of the Corporation, to serve <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of years&rsqb;</inline.instr>-year terms ending at the Annual Meeting in <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of year&rsqb;</inline.instr>; and</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>(b)</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|174|30:164"><form.text>To transact such other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment or adjournments thereof.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|174|30:164"><form.text>The date fixed by the Board of Directors as the record date for the determination of Members entitled to notice of, and to vote at, the annual meeting is the close of business on <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of record date&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l">By:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l">Secretary</form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>

<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3411">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3411</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:164.50</designator><name>Resolution authorizing annual meetings to be held remotely</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>

<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>

</section.front>
<section.body>
<form>
<form.para><form.text>RESOLVED, that it is hereby agreed and authorized that any and all future annual meetings can be held and participated either remotely or in person.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para><para.text>See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="605">N-PCL &sect;605</cite>.</para.text></para>

</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56256501b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>NOTICE OF SPECIAL MEETING OF MEMBERS OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CLUB&rsqb;</inline.instr></name></form.name.block>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-165_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="19*"/>
<tbody>
<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;address of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|175|30:165"><form.text>A special meeting of the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> will be held at the principal office of the club at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, for the purpose of <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of purpose&rsqb;</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: The close of business on &lsqb;date of closing&rsqb;, has been fixed as the record date for determining members entitled to vote at such meeting, or any adjournment thereof.&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|175|30:165"><form.text>By order of the board of directors.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|175|30:165"><para.text>Written notice must state the place, date and hour of the meeting, the means of electronic communication, if any, by which members may participate in the proceedings of the meeting and, unless it is an annual meeting, indicate that it is being issued by or at the direction of the person or persons calling the meeting. Notice of a special meeting must also state the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called. A copy of the notice of any meeting must be given, personally, by mail, or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, to each member entitled to vote at such meeting. If the notice is given personally, by first class mail or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, it must be given not less than 10 nor more than 50 days before the date of the meeting; if mailed by any other class of mail, it must be given not less than 30 nor more than 60 days before such date. If mailed, such notice is given when deposited in the United States mail, with postage thereon prepaid, directed to the member at his or her address as it appears on the record of members, or, if he or she has filed with the secretary of the corporation a written request that notices to him or her be mailed to some other address, then directed to him of her at such other address. If sent by facsimile telecommunication or mailed electronically, such notice is given when directed to the member&apos;s fax number or electronic mail address as it appears on the record of members, or, to such fax number or other electronic mail address as filed with the secretary of the corporation. Notwithstanding the foregoing, such notice shall not be deemed to have been given electronically (1) if the corporation is unable to deliver two consecutive notices to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail; or (2) the corporation otherwise becomes aware that notice cannot be delivered to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="605" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;605(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|175|30:165"><para.text>Notice of a meeting need not be given to any member who submits a waiver of the notice, in person or by proxy, whether before or after the meeting. Waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the member or the member&apos;s authorized officer, director, employee, or agent by signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means, including, but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the member. The attendance of any member at a meeting, in person or by proxy, without protesting prior to the conclusion of the meeting the lack of notice of the meeting shall constitute a waiver of notice by that member. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="606">N-PCL &sect;606</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3411">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3411</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text>For statutory provisions regarding fixing a record date for voting, see <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="611">N-PCL &sect;611</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="901 to 907" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;901 to 907</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5627d601b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>NOTICE OF SPECIAL MEETING OF MEMBERS CALLED BY MEMBERS OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CLUB&rsqb;</inline.instr></name></form.name.block>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-166_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="19*"/>
<tbody>
<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;address of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><form.text>Notice is hereby given that, pursuant to a call by members having not less than <inline.instr>&lsqb;fraction of votes&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the votes of such club, a special meeting of members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, will be held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, for the following purposes: <inline.instr>&lsqb;list of purposes&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><form.text>The close of business on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of closing&rsqb;</inline.instr> has been fixed as the record date for determining member entitled to vote at such meeting or any adjournment of such meeting.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of members&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><para.text>Written notice must state the place, date and hour of the meeting, the means of electronic communication, if any, by which members may participate in the proceedings of the meeting and, unless it is an annual meeting, indicate that it is being issued by or at the direction of the person or persons calling the meeting. Notice of a special meeting must also state the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called. A copy of the notice of any meeting must be given, personally, by mail, or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, to each member entitled to vote at such meeting. If the notice is given personally, by first class mail or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, it must be given not less than 10 nor more than 50 days before the date of the meeting; if mailed by any other class of mail, it must be given not less than 30 nor more than 60 days before such date. If mailed, such notice is given when deposited in the United States mail, with postage thereon prepaid, directed to the member at his or her address as it appears on the record of members, or, if he or she has filed with the secretary of the corporation a written request that notices to him or her be mailed to some other address, then directed to him of her at such other address. If sent by facsimile telecommunication or mailed electronically, such notice is given when directed to the member&apos;s fax number or electronic mail address as it appears on the record of members, or, to such fax number or other electronic mail address as filed with the secretary of the corporation. Notwithstanding the foregoing, such notice shall not be deemed to have been given electronically (1) if the corporation is unable to deliver two consecutive notices to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail; or (2) the corporation otherwise becomes aware that notice cannot be delivered to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail.</para.text></para>
<para><para.text><cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="605" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;605(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><para.text>Notice of a meeting need not be given to any member who submits a waiver of the notice, in person or by proxy, whether before or after the meeting. Waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the member or the member&apos;s authorized officer, director, employee, or agent by signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means, including, but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the member. The attendance of any member at a meeting, in person or by proxy, without protesting prior to the conclusion of the meeting the lack of notice of the meeting shall constitute a waiver of notice by that member. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="606">N-PCL &sect;606</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><para.text>In the absence of a provision fixing the number or proportion of members entitled to vote who are entitled to call a meeting, a special meeting of members entitled to vote may be called by such members having one-tenth of the votes entitled to be cast at such meeting. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="603" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;603(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|176|30:166"><para.text>For statutory provisions regarding fixing a record date for voting, see <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="611">N-PCL &sect;611</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3411">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3411</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<caption.block ref="manual">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Letterhead of club&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|178|30:167"><form.text>Please take notice that your annual dues of &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of annual dues&rsqb;</inline.instr> for the year beginning <inline.instr>&lsqb;identification of year&rsqb;</inline.instr> will be due and payable on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of payment&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Checks should be made payable to <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> and sent to the address shown above. When payment is made by check, no additional receipt will be sent unless requested.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|178|30:167"><form.text>Prompt payment of your dues will save unnecessary expense to the club. Please return this statement with your remittance.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|178|30:167"><para.text>If authorized by its certificate of incorporation or bylaws and subject to any limitations stated therein, a corporation may levy initiation fees, dues, and assessments on its members, whether or not they are voting members, and may impose reasonable fines or other penalties upon its members for violations of its rules and regulations. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;507(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

</research.reference.block>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:168</designator><name>Notice of assessment</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id562cb801b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<caption.block ref="manual">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Letterhead of club&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</caption.block>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">To all members:</form.line>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|179|30:168"><form.text>Notice is given that, at a meeting of the board of directors held on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of directors&apos; meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, an assessment of &dollar;<inline.instr>&lsqb;dollar amount of assessment per member&rsqb;</inline.instr> per member was levied on the membership of the club payable to the treasurer at the club&apos;s principal office at <inline.instr>&lsqb;office address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, State of New York. This assessment becomes due and payable on <inline.instr>&lsqb;due date of payment&rsqb;</inline.instr>. An assessment on any member remaining unpaid at that time will result in the suspension of all membership privileges and rights and may result in termination of the membership under the provisions of the club bylaws.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|179|30:168"><para.text>Termination of membership may result for nonpayment of fees, dues, and assessments if provided for in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>. See also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite>, holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3404">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3404</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="828, 829" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;828, 829</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|180|30:169"><form.text>Notice is given that <inline.instr>&lsqb;your annual dues/an assessment levied on you by &lsqb;the board of directors/&lsqb;title of entity&rsqb;&rsqb; on &lsqb;date of levy&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&dollar;&lsqb;dollar amount of dues&rsqb;/&dollar;&lsqb;dollar amount of assessment&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> remains unpaid and has been overdue since <inline.instr>&lsqb;due date of payment&rsqb;</inline.instr>. In accordance with Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Section <inline.instr>&lsqb;number of section&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the <inline.instr>&lsqb;bylaws/&lsqb;specification of other document&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> of this organization, <inline.instr>&lsqb;you will be expelled from the organization unless the above amount is paid within &lsqb;number of days&rsqb; days from the date of this notice/you are hereby suspended from this organization until such time as the above amount is paid in full&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
