<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|180|30:169"><para.text>Termination of membership may result for nonpayment of fees, dues, and assessments if provided for in the certificate of incorporation or the bylaws. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>. See also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite>, holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>

<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56340b01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<caption.block ref="manual">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Letterhead of club&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</caption.block>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-170_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>

<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of member&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>

</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|181|30:170"><form.text>You are notified that a special meeting of the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> will be held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, State of New York, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, to consider the propriety of <inline.instr>&lsqb;expelling/suspending&rsqb;</inline.instr> you from membership in <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;</inline.instr> for alleged violation by you of <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of rule violated&rsqb;</inline.instr> as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of accused member&apos;s actions&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|181|30:170"><form.text>You are requested to attend the above meeting. You will be permitted to answer these charges, to present relevant evidence, and to oppose the proposal to <inline.instr>&lsqb;expel/suspend&rsqb;</inline.instr> you from membership.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|181|30:170"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;OPTIONAL: You are notified that should the above proceedings result in the termination of your membership in the club, all your rights as a member of the club, including any interest in its property, will thereby be terminated.&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of person issuing notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|181|30:170"><para.text>If authorized by its certificate of incorporation or bylaws and subject to any limitations stated in such documents, a corporation may impose reasonable fines or other penalties, including termination of membership, upon its members for violations of its rules and regulations. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;507(c)</cite>. See also <cite type="case">Abraham v. Diamond Dealers Club, Inc., 80 A.D.3d 461, 914 N.Y.S.2d 152 (1st Dep&apos;t 2011)</cite>, holding that nonprofit diamond-trading corporation&apos;s bylaw providing for automatic suspension of board members for failure to pay dues was inconsistent with <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="507">N-PCL &sect;507</cite> requiring reasonable notice of suspension, and thus members&apos; voting rights could not be automatically suspended for nonpayment of dues.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3404">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3404</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="831 to 834" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;831 to 834</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
</section.block>
</analytical.level.body>
</analytical.level>

<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|183|30:172"><para.text>The above form, revised 3/16, is available from the New York State Department of State, <cite type="url" normalpub="webref">http://www.dos.ny.gov</cite>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|183|30:172"><para.text>A certificate of change that changes only the address of the corporation&apos;s registered agent may be signed and delivered to the Department of State by the registered agent, instead of the corporation. The information required in such a certificate is somewhat different from the information required when filed by the corporation. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803-A" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;803-A(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:173</designator><name>Notice to corporation by registered agent of proposed filing of certificate of change to change address for Secretary of State to mail service of process</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56404001b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<tbl ident="NYLB:30-173_001">
<table>
<tgroup align="left" cols="2">
<colspec colname="1" colnum="1" colwidth="1*"/>
<colspec colname="2" colnum="2" colwidth="19*"/>
<tbody>
<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Secretary of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
<row><entry><inline.instr>&lsqb;address of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</table>
</tbl>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|184|30:173"><form.text>Please be advised that, pursuant to <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803-A">Section 803-A of the Not-for-Profit Corp. Law</cite>, the undersigned, as registered agent for <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, will, not less than thirty (30) days from the date of this notice, file with the Department of State a certificate of change designating a new post office address to which the Secretary of State can mail a copy of any process against the corporation served upon the Secretary of State.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|184|30:173"><form.text>The certificate of change will set forth such new post office address as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of new post office address&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;zip code of new post office address&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|184|30:173"><form.text>The corporation has the right to object to the filing of the above-described certificate of change. Should this be the case, the corporation must notify the undersigned of the objection within the next thirty (30) days. If, within that time, the undersigned receives an objection from the corporation, the certificate of change will not be filed.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|184|30:173"><para.text>Prior to filing with the Department of State a certificate of change that changes only the post office address to which the Secretary of State can mail a copy of any process against the corporation served upon the Secretary of State, which certificate is signed and delivered to the Department of State by the registered agent, the agent must notify the corporation of the change and allow time for the corporation to object to it. The certificate of change filed by the registered agent must contain a statement that the agent has mailed a notice of the proposed change to the corporation not less than 30 days prior to the date of delivery to the Department of State and that the corporation has not objected to it. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803-A" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;803-A(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="154, 155" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;154, 155</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<tbl ident="NYLB:30-174_001">

<row><entry>To: <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Secretary of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></entry></row>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|185|30:174"><form.text>Please be advised that, pursuant to <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803-A">Section 803-A of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law</cite>, the undersigned, as registered agent for <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, will, not less than thirty (30) days from the date of this notice, file with the Department of State a certificate of change designating a new address for the undersigned.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|185|30:174"><form.text>The certificate of change will set forth such new address as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;new address of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;zip code of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|185|30:174"><form.text>The corporation has the right to object to the filing of the above-described certificate of change. Should this be the case, the corporation must notify the undersigned of the objection within the next thirty (30) days. If, within that time, the undersigned receives an objection from the corporation, the certificate of change will not be filed.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|185|30:174"><para.text>Prior to filing with the Department of State a certificate of change that changes only the address of the registered agent, which certificate is signed and delivered to the Department of State by the registered agent, the agent must notify the corporation of the change and allow time for the corporation to object to it. The certificate of change filed by the registered agent must contain a statement that the agent has mailed a notice of the proposed change to the corporation not less than 30 days prior to the date of delivery to the Department of State, and that the corporation has not objected to it. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803-A" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;803-A(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:175</designator><name>Certificate of resignation of registered agent<sep/>Official form</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56452201b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<image.block ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|186|30:175">
<image ident="I02CB5N"/>
<image ident="I00FGXP"/>
<image ident="I00FQM1"/>
</image.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|186|30:175"><para.text>The above form, revised 3/17, is available from the New York State Department of State, <cite type="url" normalpub="webref">http://www.dos.ny.gov</cite>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|186|30:175"><para.text>The fee for filing a certificate of resignation, which is subject to change, is &dollar;30. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="104-A" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;104-A(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|186|30:175"><para.text>The certificate of resignation must be signed by the registered agent and must contain the provisions set forth in the statute. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="305" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;305(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|186|30:175"><para.text>The designation of a registered agent will terminate 30 days after the filing by the Department of State of a certificate of resignation or a certificate containing a revocation or change of the designation, whichever is filed earlier. A certificate designating a new registered agent may be delivered to the Department of State by the corporation within such 30-day period or thereafter. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="305" subref="(d)">N-PCL &sect;305(d)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3451">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3451</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3459">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3459</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:176</designator><name>Certificate of change<sep/>Official form</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56479301b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<image.block ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|187|30:176">
<image ident="I03NOY9"/>
<image ident="I03NY7C"/>
<image ident="I03P34H"/>
<image ident="I06AGWV"/>
</image.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|187|30:176"><para.text>The above form, revised 1/23, is available from the New York State Department of State, <cite type="url" normalpub="webref">http://www.dos.ny.gov</cite>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|187|30:176"><para.text>Corrections prior to filing by Department of State: Any certificate or other instrument relating to a domestic or foreign corporation submitted to the Department of State under the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law may be corrected with respect to any typographical, or similar nonmaterial error apparent on the face of the certificate or instrument, prior to the filing of such certificate or instrument by the Department of State. Such correction will be effected by the Department of State upon authorization in writing by the incorporator in a form acceptable to the Department. Such authorization may be delivered by mail or sent by electronic mail to the Department. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="105" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;105(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|187|30:176"><para.text>Corrections following incorporation: Any certificate or other instrument relating to a domestic or foreign corporation filed by the Department of State under the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law may be corrected with respect to any typographical or similar nonmaterial error apparent on the face or defect in the execution thereof including the deletion of any matter not permitted to be stated therein. A certificate, entitled &ldquo;Certificate of correction of <leaveout size="small"/> (correct title of certificate and name of corporation)&rdquo; must be signed and delivered to the Department of State by mail or electronic mail. It must set forth the name of the corporation, the date the certificate to be corrected was filed by the Department of State, the provision in the certificate as corrected or eliminated and if the execution was defective, the proper execution. The filing of the certificate by the Department of State will not alter the effective time of the instrument being corrected, which will remain as its original effective time, and will not affect any right or liability accrued or incurred before such filing. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="105" subref="(b)">N-PCL &sect;105(b)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|187|30:176"><para.text>A corporate name may not be changed or corrected under this section other than to correct any typographical or similar nonmaterial error. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="105" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;105(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="154, 155" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;154, 155</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
</section.block>
</analytical.level.body>
</analytical.level>
</analytical.level.body>
</analytical.level>
<analytical.level>
<front>
<outline.name.block>
<designator>4</designator><name>Amendment of Certificate of Incorporation</name></outline.name.block>
</front>
<analytical.level.body>
<section.block>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:177</designator><name>Resolution proposing amendment to certificate of incorporation</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id564ee601b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>Resolved, that the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> hereby proposes that the certificate of incorporation of the corporation be amended as follows:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation be amended to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>That a new article be added to the certificate of incorporation to be numbered and to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of new article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>That Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation be deleted.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>Resolved further, that the proposed <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation be submitted to a vote at <inline.instr>&lsqb;the next annual meeting of the members/a special meeting of members to be held at &lsqb;location and address of meeting&rsqb;, &lsqb;name of city&rsqb;, State of New York, on &lsqb;date of meeting&rsqb;, at &lsqb;time of meeting&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><form.text>Resolved further, that the secretary give notice of such meeting and such proposed <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> as required by the provisions of the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law and by the bylaws of this corporation to the extent that they are not inconsistent with those provisions.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><para.text>A not-for-profit corporation may not reduce its corporate duration by amendment to the certificate of incorporation. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="801" subref="(b)" pararef="(4)">N-PCL &sect;801(b)(4)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><para.text>The procedure to amend the certificate of incorporation is set forth in the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law. If there are members entitled to vote thereon, an amendment may be adopted by a majority vote of such members at a meeting of members. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(1)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(1)</cite>. If there are no members entitled to vote on it, an amendment may be adopted by a majority of the entire board. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(2)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(2)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><para.text>To accomplish any amendment, a certificate of amendment must be signed and delivered to the Department of State. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;803(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><para.text>For form drafting principles relating to amendment of the certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:42">&sect;30:42</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|188|30:177"><para.text>For form of certificate of amendment of certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:187">&sect;30:187</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="143 to 157" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;143 to 157</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:178</designator><name>Notice to members of special meeting to consider proposed amendments to certificate of incorporation</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56515701b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|189|30:178"><form.text>A special meeting of the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, will be held at <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;address of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;address of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, New York, on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, at <inline.instr>&lsqb;time of special meeting&rsqb;</inline.instr>, for the purpose of amending the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr> pursuant to a resolution of the board of directors adopted on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of adoption&rsqb;</inline.instr>, as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;description of resolution&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of notice&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|189|30:178"><para.text>Written notice must state the place, date and hour of the meeting, the means of electronic communication, if any, by which members may participate in the proceedings of the meeting and, unless it is an annual meeting, indicate that it is being issued by or at the direction of the person or persons calling the meeting. Notice of a special meeting must also state the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called. A copy of the notice of any meeting must be given, personally, by mail, or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, to each member entitled to vote at such meeting. If the notice is given personally, by first class mail or by facsimile telecommunications or by electronic mail, it must be given not less than 10 nor more than 50 days before the date of the meeting; if mailed by any other class of mail, it must be given not less than 30 nor more than 60 days before such date. If mailed, such notice is given when deposited in the United States mail, with postage thereon prepaid, directed to the member at his or her address as it appears on the record of members, or, if he or she has filed with the secretary of the corporation a written request that notices to him or her be mailed to some other address, then directed to him of her at such other address. If sent by facsimile telecommunication or mailed electronically, such notice is given when directed to the member&apos;s fax number or electronic mail address as it appears on the record of members, or, to such fax number or other electronic mail address as filed with the secretary of the corporation. Notwithstanding the foregoing, such notice shall not be deemed to have been given electronically (1) if the corporation is unable to deliver two consecutive notices to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail; or (2) the corporation otherwise becomes aware that notice cannot be delivered to the member by facsimile telecommunication or electronic mail. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="605" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;605(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|189|30:178"><para.text>Notice of a meeting need not be given to any member who submits a waiver of such notice, either in person or by proxy, whether before or after the meeting. Waiver of notice may be written or electronic. If written, the waiver must be executed by the member or the member&apos;s authorized officer, director, employee, or agent by signing such waiver or causing his or her signature to be affixed to such waiver by any reasonable means, including, but not limited to facsimile signature. If electronic, the transmission of the waiver must be sent by electronic mail and set forth, or be submitted with, information from which it can reasonably be determined that the transmission was authorized by the member. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="606">N-PCL &sect;606</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|189|30:178"><para.text>Any number of amendments may be submitted to the members and voted on by them at one meeting.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="147 to 153" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;147 to 153</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>

<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5653c801b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>Resolved, that the board of directors of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> hereby amends the certificate of incorporation of the corporation as follows:</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>The location of the corporation is to be changed from the current location, <inline.instr>&lsqb;current address of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, to the new location of <inline.instr>&lsqb;new address of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Consequently, Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation, which contains this information, shall be amended to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of amended article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>The post office address to which the Secretary of State shall mail a copy of any process against the corporation served on the Secretary of State is to be changed from the current address, <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of current address&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, to the new address of <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of new address&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Consequently, Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation, which contains this information, shall be amended to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of amended article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>The designation of the corporation&apos;s registered agent and the address of the registered agent are to be changed from the current designation and address, <inline.instr>&lsqb;current designation of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>, to the new designation and address of <inline.instr>&lsqb;new designation of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr> and <inline.instr>&lsqb;address of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Consequently, Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation, which contains this information, shall be amended to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of amended article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>The address of the corporation&apos;s registered agent, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, is to be changed from the current address, <inline.instr>&lsqb;current address of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr> to the new address of <inline.instr>&lsqb;new address of registered agent&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of city&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of county&rsqb;</inline.instr>, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of state&rsqb;</inline.instr>. Consequently, Article <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of article&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation, which contains this information, shall be amended to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of amended article&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><form.text>Resolved further, that the <inline.instr>&lsqb;titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr> are authorized to draft, execute, and deliver to the Department of State an appropriate certificate of amendment of the certificate of incorporation to accomplish the <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation as set forth above.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><para.text>Any one or more of the following changes may be authorized by or pursuant to authorization of the board: (1) to specify or change the location of the office of the corporation; (2) to specify or change the post office address to which the Secretary of State can mail a copy of any notice required by law; and (3) to make, revoke, or change the designation of a registered agent or to specify or change the address of its registered agent. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;802(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><para.text>The above changes of the certificate of incorporation may be accomplished by filing a certificate of change, instead of a certificate of amendment of the certificate of incorporation. See <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:171 et seq." secrange="y">&dblsect;30:171 et seq.</cite></para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|190|30:179"><para.text>For form of certificate of amendment, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:187">&sect;30:187</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="150">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;150</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:180</designator><name>Resolution of members to amend certificate of incorporation</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56563901b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>WHEREAS <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s Certificate of Incorporation currently defines the number of members that <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s Board of Directors shall have; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>WHEREAS the members have determined that it is in the best interests of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> to amend the Certificate of Incorporation to state that the number of members of the Board of Directors, as well as the times and manner of their appointment, shall be provided by <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s Bylaws.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>NOW, THEREFORE, it is hereby:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Certificate of Amendment to the Certificate of Incorporation of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> in the form attached as Exhibit <inline.instr>&lsqb;designation of exhibit&rsqb;</inline.instr> hereto (the &ldquo;Certificate of Amendment&rdquo;) is hereby adopted and approved;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the President, Vice President, Secretary, Treasurer and any other officer of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> (the &ldquo;Authorized Officers&rdquo;) be, and each of them hereby is, authorized and directed to execute, deliver and file the Certificate of Amendment with the Department of State of the State of New York and to pay any fees related to such filing;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|191|30:180"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Authorized Officers be, and each of them hereby is, authorized, empowered and directed to take all such further action and to execute, deliver and file all such further agreements, certificates, instruments and documents, in the name and on behalf of the Company and to pay or cause to be paid all expenses as they or any one of them shall deem necessary, desirable, advisable or appropriate to consummate, effectuate, carry out or further the transactions contemplated by and the intent and purposes of the foregoing resolutions.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:181</designator><name>Resolution of members to amend certificate of incorporation<sep/>Additional provision</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id5658aa01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> was formed under the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law requires the unanimous consent of members to approve an action taken without a meeting, unless a provision of the certificate of incorporation, not inconsistent with the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, allows for the written consent of less than all of the members; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, the Members desire to add a provision to the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> to allow Members to approve an action taken without a meeting by written consent of less than all of the Members; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law requires the amendments to the certificate of incorporation include the post office address of the office without the state at which the books and records of the corporation shall be kept and the designation of the Secretary of State as agent for service of process; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, the New York Not-for-Profit Corporation Law requires that amendments to the certificate of incorporation be authorized by a majority vote of the Members at a meeting, the affirmative votes cast in favor of the amendment being at least equal to a quorum; and</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>WHEREAS, pursuant to the bylaws of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, Members entitled to cast 100 votes or one-tenth of the total number of votes entitled to be cast thereat, whichever is less, present in person or by proxy, shall constitute a quorum at a meeting of Members for the transaction of any business;</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>NOW THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, that the Members hereby approve and authorize the amendment of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>&apos;s certificate of incorporation to (i) allow <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> Members to approve an action taken without a meeting by written consent of less that all of the members, (ii) to add the post office address of the office without the state at which the books and records of the corporation shall be kept, and (iii) to designate the Secretary of State as agent for service of process; and further</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Members hereby authorize and direct the President, Secretary or other Officer of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> to execute and file a certificate of amendment with the New York Department of State substantially in form of the draft attached hereto, subject to such changes as may be requested or required by the Department of State or otherwise in order to file such amendment; and further</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|192|30:181"><form.text>RESOLVED, that the Members hereby authorize and direct the President, Secretary or other Officer of <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr> to take all necessary and proper actions to effectuate such amendment.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>
<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:182</designator><name>Resolution amending certificate of incorporation by striking quoted matter</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id565b1b01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|193|30:182"><form.text>Resolved, that the certificate of incorporation of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, be amended by striking from the certificate of incorporation the following matter: <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of article affected, reciting matter to be stricken&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|193|30:182"><form.text>Resolved further, that the <inline.instr>&lsqb;titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr> are authorized to draft, execute, and deliver to the Department of State an appropriate certificate of amendment of the certificate of incorporation to accomplish the <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation as set forth in this resolution.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|193|30:182"><para.text>The procedure to amend the certificate of incorporation is set forth in the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law. If there are members entitled to vote on it, an amendment may be adopted by a majority vote of such members at a meeting of members. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(1)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(1)</cite>. If there are no members entitled to vote on it, an amendment may be adopted by a majority of the entire board. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(2)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(2)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|193|30:182"><para.text>To accomplish any amendment, a certificate of amendment must be signed and delivered to the Department of State. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;803(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|193|30:182"><para.text>For form of certificate of amendment of certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:187">&sect;30:187</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="147 to 153" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;147 to 153</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|194|30:183"><form.text>Resolved further, that the <inline.instr>&lsqb;titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr> are authorized to draft, execute, and deliver to the Department of State an appropriate certificate of amendment of the certificate of incorporation to accomplish the <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation as set forth in this resolution.</form.text></form.para>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|196|30:185"><form.text>Resolved further, that the <inline.instr>&lsqb;titles of officers&rsqb;</inline.instr> are authorized to draft, execute, and deliver to the Department of State an appropriate certificate of amendment of the certificate of incorporation to accomplish the <inline.instr>&lsqb;amendment/amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr> of the certificate of incorporation as set forth in this resolution.</form.text></form.para>

If there are members entitled to vote thereon, an amendment may be adopted by a majority vote of such members at a meeting of members. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(1)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(1)</cite>. If there are no members entitled to vote thereon, an amendment may be adopted by a majority of the entire board. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802" subref="(a)" pararef="(2)">N-PCL &sect;802(a)(2)</cite>.</para.text></para>

<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|196|30:185"><para.text>For form of certificate of amendment of certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:187">&sect;30:187</cite>.</para.text></para>

<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|197|30:186"><form.text>The undersigned, being all the members of <inline.instr>&lsqb;&lsqb;name of club&rsqb;/&lsqb;name of association&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>, a New York not-for-profit corporation, hereby consent to and adopt the following amendments to the corporation&apos;s certificate of incorporation:</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|197|30:186"><form.text><inline.instr>&lsqb;Text of amendments&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Dated: <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of consent&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Names of members&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>

<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|197|30:186"><para.text>To accomplish any amendment, a certificate of amendment must be signed and delivered to the Department of State. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;803(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:187</designator><name>Certificate of amendment of certificate of incorporation<sep/>Domestic corporation<sep/>Official form</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EFM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id567fba01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<image.block ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187">
<image ident="I03PDD3"/>
<image ident="I03QIVL"/>
<image ident="I03QRQC"/>
<image ident="I067ORH"/>
<image ident="I03RXN9"/>
<image ident="I03S6HV"/>
</image.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>The above form, revised 12/22, is available from the New York State Department of State, <cite type="url" normalpub="webref">http://www.dos.ny.gov</cite>, and is reprinted here for illustrative purposes.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>Any number of amendments or changes may be included in one certificate of amendment under <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803">&sect;803</cite>. The certificate of amendment may also include any amendments or changes permitted by other sections of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law. In such case, the certificate of amendment must set forth any additional statement required by any other section of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law which specifies the contents of a certificate to effect such amendment or change. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803">N-PCL &sect;803</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>Certain consents or approvals must be endorsed or attached to the certificate of amendment in instances where the amendment: (1) adds, changes, or eliminates a purpose, power, or provision the inclusion of which in a certificate of incorporation requires the consent or approval of a governmental body or officer or any other person or body; or (2) changes the name of a corporation whose certificate of incorporation had such consent or approval. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="804" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;804(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>The fee for filing a certificate of amendment, which is subject to change, is currently &dollar;30. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="104-A" subref="(f)">N-PCL &sect;104-A(f)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>The Department of State will make, certify, and transmit electronically a copy of the certificate of amendment to the county in which the office of the corporation is located. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="104" subref="(g)">N-PCL &sect;104(g)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>For discussion concerning execution of corporate documents, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:34">&sect;30:34</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>For form drafting principles for amendments to a certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:42">&sect;30:42</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|198|30:187"><para.text>A certificate of amendment of a certificate of incorporation must be entitled &ldquo;Certificate of Amendment of the Certificate of Incorporation of <ital>(Name of Corporation)</ital> Under &sect;803 of the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law.&rdquo; <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="803" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;803(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="154">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &sect;154</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section>
<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:189</designator><name>Directors&apos; resolution authorizing filing of restated certificate of incorporation</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56849c01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|200|30:189"><form.text>Resolved, that pursuant to <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">Section 805 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law</cite>, the President and secretary of this corporation are hereby authorized and directed to execute and file a restated certificate of incorporation <inline.instr>&lsqb;as amended previously without any further amendment or change as it is now in force and effect/and to include in it &lsqb;specification of one or more of amendments or changes that may be authorized by board under &sect;802(c)&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|200|30:189"><form.text>Such restated certificate of incorporation shall be the certificate of incorporation of the corporation.</form.text></form.para>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|200|30:189"><para.text>A corporation, when authorized by the board of directors, may restate in a single certificate the text of its certificate of incorporation without making any amendment or change thereby, except that it may include any one or more of the amendments or changes which may be authorized by the board without a vote of shareholders or members. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;805(a)</cite>. In the alternative, a corporation may restate in a single certificate the text of its certificate of incorporation as amended by the restated certificate, to effect any one or more of the amendments or changes authorized by the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, when authorized by the statutory provision. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802">N-PCL &sect;802</cite>, governing amendment or change. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;805(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|200|30:189"><para.text>Any amendment or change under these sections of the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law (<cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">N-PCL &sect;805</cite>) is subject to any other section, not inconsistent with these sections, which would be applicable if a separate certificate were filed to effect the amendment or change. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(d)">N-PCL &sect;805(d)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="156, 157" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;156, 157</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<section.front>
<outline.name.block><label>&sect;</label><designator>30:190</designator><name>Restated certificate of incorporation without new amendments or changes</name></outline.name.block>
<online.view>
<online.view.item>FMS</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>NFP</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>COL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FCV</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>FTR</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>EBL</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>TEM</online.view.item>
<online.view.item>MTD</online.view.item>
</online.view>
</section.front>
<section.body>
<form uuid="Id56870d01b6411e684899cfd92da4eb0">
<form.name.block><name>RESTATED CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CORPORATION&rsqb;</inline.instr> UNDER <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">SECTION 805 OF THE N.Y. NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION LAW</cite></name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>Pursuant to the provisions of <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">Section 805 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law</cite>, the undersigned corporation, as authorized by its board of directors, adopts the following restated certificate of incorporation.</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>The name of the corporation is <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>&lsqb;The name of the corporation has never been changed/The name under which the corporation was originally formed was &lsqb;former name of corporation&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>The corporation&apos;s certificate of incorporation was filed by the Department of State on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of filing certificate of incorporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, under the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>This restated certificate of incorporation is authorized by the board of directors of the corporation.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>The text of the certificate of incorporation, as previously amended, is hereby restated without further amendment or change to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of complete text&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><form.text>In witness whereof, the corporation, through its President and secretary, has executed this restated certificate of incorporation on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of execution&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l">By:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l">Attested:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of secretary&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Corporate seal&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
</signature.group>
</signature.block>
<note.block>
<note.group note.head="none">
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>A corporation, when authorized by the board of directors, may restate in a single certificate the text of its certificate of incorporation without making any amendment or change thereby, except that it may include any one or more of the amendments or changes which may be authorized by the board without a vote of shareholders or members. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;805(a)</cite>. In the alternative, a corporation may restate in a single certificate the text of its certificate of incorporation as amended by the restated certificate, to effect any one or more of the amendments or changes authorized by the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, when authorized by the statutory provision (<cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="802">N-PCL &sect;802</cite>) governing amendment or change. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(a)">N-PCL &sect;805(a)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>Any amendment or change under these sections of the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law (<cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">N-PCL &sect;805</cite>) is subject to any other section, not inconsistent with these sections, which would be applicable if a separate certificate were filed to effect the amendment or change. See <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(d)">N-PCL &sect;805(d)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>The fee for filing a restated certificate of incorporation, which is subject to change, is currently &dollar;30. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="104-A" subref="(h)">N-PCL &sect;104-A(h)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>The Department of State will make, certify, and transmit electronically a copy of the restated certificate of incorporation to the county in which the office of the corporation is located. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="104" subref="(g)">N-PCL &sect;104(g)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>Upon filing by the Department of State, the original certificate of incorporation will be superseded, and the restated certificate of incorporation, including any amendments and changes made in it, will be the certificate of incorporation of the corporation. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(f)">N-PCL &sect;805(f)</cite>.</para.text></para>
</note.group>
<item.reference.block>
<item.reference><name.block><label>Paragraph</label><designator>4.</designator></name.block>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>If the restated certificate merely restates and integrates but does not substantively amend the certificate of incorporation as previously amended, then the certificate should include a statement that the text of the certificate of incorporation, as amended previously, is thereby restated without further amendment or change to read as set forth in full. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(b)" pararef="(3)">N-PCL &sect;805(b)(3)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>A restated certificate of incorporation need not include statements as to the incorporator(s) or as to the first directors. <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805" subref="(c)">N-PCL &sect;805(c)</cite>.</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>. See <cite type="case">Nathan Littauer Hospital Ass&apos;n v. Spitzer, 287 A.D.2d 202, 734 N.Y.S.2d 671 (3d Dep&apos;t 2001)</cite> (reservation of enumerated powers contained in not-for-profit hospital&apos;s restated certificate of incorporation to its newly created parent corporation was not a change in, elimination of, or addition to corporate powers, such as would trigger Supreme Court review and approval of proposed affiliation of corporation with another corporation under newly created common parent).</para.text></para>
<para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|201|30:190"><para.text>For discussion of relevant form drafting principles for a restated certificate of incorporation, see <cite type="secondaryxref" secref="30:42">&sect;30:42</cite>.</para.text></para>
<research.reference.block>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="topic.key" normalpub="key" sub="Corporations and Business Organizations" numref="3374">West&apos;s Key Number Digest, Corporations and Business Organizations &key;3374</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
<reference.entry><ref.text><cite type="secondary" normalpub="nyj2" topicname="Business Relationships" secref="156, 157" secrange="y">N.Y. Jur. 2d, Business Relationships &dblsect;156, 157</cite></ref.text></reference.entry>
</research.reference.block>
</item.reference>
</item.reference.block>
</note.block>
</form>
</section.body>
</section>

<form.name.block><name>RESTATED CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION OF <inline.instr>&lsqb;NAME OF CORPORATION&rsqb;</inline.instr> UNDER <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">SECTION 805 OF THE N.Y. NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION LAW</cite></name></form.name.block>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>Pursuant to the provisions of <cite type="lrre" normalpub="statute-us-ny-law-notforprofitcorp" secref="805">&sect;805 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law</cite>, the undersigned corporation, as authorized by its board of directors, hereby adopts the following restated certificate of incorporation.</form.text></form.para>
<form.unit>
<form.item><name.block><designator>1</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>The name of the corporation is <inline.instr>&lsqb;name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>. <inline.instr>&lsqb;The name of the corporation has never been changed/The name under which the corporation was originally formed was &lsqb;former name of corporation&rsqb;&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>2</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>The corporation&apos;s certificate of incorporation was filed by the Department of State on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of filing certificate of incorporation&rsqb;</inline.instr>, under the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law of the State of New York.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>3</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>This restated certificate of incorporation is authorized by the board of directors of the corporation.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
<form.item><name.block><designator>4</designator></name.block><form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>The certificate of incorporation is amended or changed to effect <inline.instr>&lsqb;an amendment/change/certain amendments/changes&rsqb;</inline.instr> authorized by the N.Y. Not-for-Profit Corporation Law, specifically: <inline.instr>&lsqb;specification of each amendment or change&rsqb;</inline.instr>. The text of the certificate of incorporation, as amended heretofore, is hereby restated as further amended or changed to read as follows: <inline.instr>&lsqb;recitation of complete text&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para></form.item>
</form.unit>
<form.para ct.id="f2fd26a0b92511efa75bc0a5c2da1858|202|30:191"><form.text>In witness whereof, the corporation, through its President and secretary, has executed this restated certificate of incorporation on <inline.instr>&lsqb;date of execution&rsqb;</inline.instr>.</form.text></form.para>
<signature.block ref="manual">
<signature.group position="r">
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of corporation&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l">By:</form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
<form.line align="l" lineover="y"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Name of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.line align="l"><inline.instr>&lsqb;Title of authorized representative&rsqb;</inline.instr></form.line>
<form.vertical.space amt="1"/>
